long.ar:
Shopify Spy scrapes products from Shopify powered stores and saves as an Excel document or CSV file.

2024 Q3 changes:
- Download a single product
- Display some store metadata
- Better handling if errors

2024 Q2 changes:
- Highly requested feature: Downloading images.
- Slow mode: Extract more fields but slower: Variant Barcode, Image Alt Text, Variant Tax Code, Variant Weight Unit
- Old "Excel" format has been renamed to "Excel (Legacy)" and will be removed in further releases
- Option to manually specify a collection handle if the list of collections is too large.
- Enhanced error handling with clearer explanations

2024 Q1 changes:
- Resolved "Out of memory" error for large stores; now, CSV/Excel files are automatically split for efficient data handling.
- Improved status messages for enhanced clarity and precision.

2023 Q3-Q4 changes:
- Undock popup: you can use browser while the scraping is in progress and even scrape several store simultaneously
- Renewed login flow

Shopify Spy features:
✓ Can extract thousands of products within minutes
✓ Filter by a specific collection
✓ All fields from Shopify product listing are included (see below)
✓ All product images are added to the CSV
✓ Download images along with CSV
✓ Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Save as XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices
✓ Does not require excessive permissions

Why Shopify Spy:

For e-commerce store owners, Shopify Spy allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. With this tool, you can quickly and easily extract thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores and filter them by specific collections.

For digital marketers, Shopify Spy provides accurate and reliable product data to help you analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients.

For product researchers, Shopify Spy makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. This means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

For dropshippers, Shopify Spy is an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store, and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products.

For data analysts, Shopify Spy's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

So, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, Shopify Spy has everything you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try it out today and take your business to the next level!

Supported Fields:
- Handle: The unique identifier for the product.
- Title: The name of the product.
- Body (HTML): The HTML description of the product.
- Vendor: The name of the product's vendor.
- Product Type: The category or type of the product.
- Tags: Keywords associated with the product.
- Published: Indicates whether the product is published or unpublished.

Options:
- Option Name
- Option Value

Variants:
- Variant SKU: The stock keeping unit for the variant.
- Variant Grams: The weight of the variant in grams.
- Variant Price: The price of the variant.
- Variant Compare At Price: The original price of the variant, used for comparison.
- Variant Inventory Qty: Inventory quantity, where 0 indicates out of stock and 1 indicates in stock.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Variants:
- Variant Barcode: The barcode for the variant.
- Variant Tax Code: The tax code associated with the variant.
- Variant Weight Unit: The unit of weight measurement for the variant.

Images:
- Image Src: The source URL of the image.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Images:
- Image Alt Text: The alternative text for the image.

"يقوم Shopify Spy بجرد المنتجات من المتاجر التي تعمل بواسطة Shopify ويحفظها كمستند Excel أو ملف CSV.

تغييرات الربع الثالث 2023:
- إلغاء ربط النافذة المنبثقة: يمكنك استخدام المتصفح أثناء تقدم عملية الجرد وحتى جرد عدة متاجر في نفس الوقت
- تجديد عملية تسجيل الدخول

ميزات Shopify Spy:
✓ يمكن استخراج آلاف المنتجات في غضون دقائق
✓ التصفية حسب مجموعة محددة
✓ جميع الحقول من قائمة المنتجات Shopify مدرجة (انظر أدناه)
✓ يتم إضافة جميع صور المنتج إلى ملف CSV
✓ التصدير إلى تنسيق CSV متوافق مع تنسيق استيراد Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ حفظ كمستند XLSX (Excel) مع أنواع البيانات المناسبة - التواريخ، الأسعار
✓ لا يتطلب أذونات مفرطة

لماذا Shopify Spy:

بالنسبة لأصحاب المتاجر الإلكترونية، يتيح لك Shopify Spy متابعة منتجات منافسيك وأسعارهم والترويج لهم. باستخدام هذه الأداة، يمكنك استخراج آلاف المنتجات من المتاجر التي تعمل بواسطة Shopify بسرعة وسهولة وتصفيتها حسب المجموعات المحددة.

بالنسبة للمسوقين الرقميين، يوفر Shopify Spy بيانات المنتجات الدقيقة والموثوقة لمساعدتك في تحليل اتجاهات السوق وتحديد الفرص المحتملة لعملائك.

بالنسبة لباحثي المنتجات، يجعل Shopify Spy من السهل جمع البيانات حول عدد كبير من المنتجات بسرعة وكفاءة. هذا يعني أنك يمكنك تحديد الاتجاهات والرؤى في مجال بحثك بسهولة.

بالنسبة للموردين المباشرين، Shopify Spy هو أداة أساسية للعثور على منتجات جديدة لإضافتها إلى متجرك، ومراقبة التسعير وتوافر المنتج لمنتجاتك الحالية.

بالنسبة لمحللي البيانات، قدرة Shopify Spy على استخراج بيانات المنتج من متاجر Shopify وحفظها في تنسيق CSV أو Excel تجعله أداة جذابة لمعالجة كميات كبيرة من البيانات بسرعة وكفاءة.

لذا، سواء كنت صاحب متجر إلكتروني، أو مسوق رقمي، أو باحث عن المنتجات، أو مورد مباشر، أو محلل بيانات، فإن Shopify Spy لديه كل ما تحتاجه للبقاء على اطلاع على أحدث اتجاهات المنتجات والرؤى. جربه اليوم وخذ عملك إلى المستوى التالي!

الحقول المدعومة:
- العنوان
- المقبض
- الوصف (بالنص العادي)
- تاريخ ووقت الإنشاء
- تاريخ ووقت التحديث
- البائع
- نوع المنتج
- العلامات
- السعر الأقصى
- السعر الأدنى
- 5 متغيرات للمنتج بما في ذلك العنوان، السعر، سعر الخصم، ورابط الصورة
- 10 صور
- كل الخيارات

Introducing the all-new "Shopify Product Scraper" – your one-stop solution for scraping products from Shopify powered stores. Renamed from Shopify Spy, the Shopify Product Scraper is designed to provide an enhanced user experience, allowing you to save product data as an Excel document or CSV file with ease. 

With the Shopify Product Scraper, you can now seamlessly scrape thousands of products within minutes. The extension allows you to filter products by a specific collection, ensuring you get exactly what you're looking for. The Shopify Product Scraper features a user-friendly interface that makes it easy to extract all fields from the Shopify product listing, including title, handle, description, created date and time, vendor, and much more. 

The Shopify Product Scraper is not just about scraping data, it's about providing you with valuable insights. All product images are added to the CSV, giving you a comprehensive view of the products, not just the numbers. The Shopify Product Scraper also allows you to export data to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format. 

The Shopify Product Scraper also supports saving data as an XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices. This feature ensures that your data is not only accurate but also easy to read and analyze. The Shopify Product Scraper does not require excessive permissions, making it a safe and secure tool for your business needs.

For e-commerce store owners, the Shopify Product Scraper is a game-changer. It allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. With this tool, you can quickly and easily extract thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores and filter them by specific collections. 

Digital marketers can leverage the Shopify Product Scraper to provide accurate and reliable product data. This data can be used to analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients. The Shopify Product Scraper makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently.

Product researchers will find the Shopify Product Scraper invaluable. With this tool, you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease. The Shopify Product Scraper is an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store, and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products.

Dropshippers, the Shopify Product Scraper is here to revolutionize your business. Find new products, monitor pricing, and track product availability all in one place. The Shopify Product Scraper is designed to make your business operations smoother and more efficient.

Data analysts, rejoice! The Shopify Product Scraper's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

In conclusion, the Shopify Product Scraper is a must-have tool for anyone involved in e-commerce, digital marketing, product research, dropshipping, or data analysis. Try it out today and take your business to the next level!

Shopify Spy ከShopify የሚነሳሱ ሱቆች ምርቶችን ይቅበርትራል እና እንደ Excel ሰነድ ወይም CSV ፋይል ያስቀምጣል።

2023 Q3 ለውጦች:
- ማለፊያን ያወልቅ: ማስቀመጡ በመቆጠር ላይ ሲሆን እርስዎ ብሮውዘርዎን መጠቀም ይችላሉ እና ከዛም በላይ አንድ ላይ ብዙ ሱቆችን በማንዴት መስቀም ይችላሉ
- ተሻሽሎ የተገባ መግቢያ ሂደት

Shopify Spy የሚስተናግድ ባህሪያቶች:
✓ በደቂቃዎች ውስጥ ሺሕ ሺሕ ምርቶችን ሊሰቀም ይችላል
✓ በተለይተው ስብስብ ማጣሪያ
✓ ከShopify ምርት ዝርዝር ሁሉም መስኮች ተካተተዋል (ከታች ይመልከቱ)
✓ ሁሉም ምርት ምስሎች ወደ CSV ተጨምረዋል
✓ ከShopify ማስገባት ቅርጽ ጋር የሚስማማ ወደ CSV ቅርጽ ማስመለስ
✓ ከሚገባ ደረጃዎች - ቀኖች፣ ዋጋዎች እንደ XLSX (Excel ሰነድ) ማስቀመጥ
✓ ከመጠበቂያ መፍትሄ በላይ ፈቃድ አይጠይቅም

Shopify Spy ለምን:

ለድህረ መሸጫ ሱቆች ባለቤቶች, Shopify Spy የተመደባችሁን አቅራቢዎች ምርቶች፣ ዋጋ፣ እና ማስተዋወቂያዎች ለመከታተል ይፈቅዳል። በዚህ መሣሪያ ላይ፣ ከShopify-የሚነሳሱ ሱቆች ሺሕ ሺሕ ምርቶችን በፍጥነትና በቀላሉ መሰቀም እና በተለይተው ስብስብ ማጣሪያ መስበር ይችላሉ።

ለዲጂታል ማርኬተሮች, Shopify Spy ትክክለኛና ታማኝ ምርት ውሂብ ያቀርባል የገበያ ረቂቅ ለማንበብ እና ለደንበኞችዎ የእድገት እድሎችን ለመለየት።

ለምርት ምርመራዎች, Shopify Spy በፍጥነትና በአግባቡ በብዙነት ላይ ውሂብ ለመሰብሰብ ይቀላል። ይህ ይህንን ማለት ማለት በምርመራዎ መስክ በቀላሉ ረቂቅን እና ውሂብን መለየት ይችላሉ።

ለድሮፕሺፖርዎች, Shopify Spy ለሱቆችዎ ምርቶችን ለመጨመር አስፈላጊ መሣሪያ ነው፣ እና ዋጋና ምርት ዝግጁነት ለቀድሞ አለውድ ምርቶችዎ መምረጥ።

ለውሂብ ትንተናላዎች, Shopify Spy ምርት ውሂብን ከShopify ሱቆች ማስቀምጥ እና በCSV ወይም Excel ቅርጽ ማስቀመጥ የሚችልበት አቅም በፍጥነትና በአግባቡ ብዙ ውሂብ ለመቀጣጠር የሚስተናገድ መሣሪያ ያደርጋል።

ስለሆነ ፣ የኤ-ንግድ ሱቆ ባለቤት ፣ ዲጂታል ማርኬተር ፣ ምርት ምርመራዊ ፣ ድሮፕሺፖር ወይም ውሂብ ትንተናላይ የሆኑ ሆነው ፣ Shopify Spy የተለያዩ ምርት ረቂቅና ውሂብ ለመለከት የሚያስፈልጉትን ሁሉ አለው። ዛሬ ይሞክሩት እና ድህረ መሸጫዎን ወደ ቀጣይ ደረጃ ይዛምቡ።

የሚደግፉ መስኮች:
- ርዕስ
- እጅግ
- መግለጫ (በቀላሉ ጽሕፈት)
- የተፈጠረው ቀን እና ሰዓት
- የታደሰው ቀን እና ሰዓት
- ሻጭ
- የምርት ዓይነት
- መለያዎች
- ከፍተኛ ዋጋ
- ዝቅተኛ ዋጋ
- ምስል URL የሚያካትት ርዕስ፣ ዋጋ፣ ቅ

For product researchers, Shopify Spy makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. This means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

For dropshippers, Shopify Spy is an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store, and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products.

For data analysts, Shopify Spy's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

So, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, Shopify Spy has everything you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try it out today and take your business to the next level!

Supported Fields:
- Handle: The unique identifier for the product.
- Title: The name of the product.
- Body (HTML): The HTML description of the product.
- Vendor: The name of the product's vendor.
- Product Type: The category or type of the product.
- Tags: Keywords associated with the product.
- Published: Indicates whether the product is published or unpublished.

Options:
- Option Name
- Option Value

Variants:
- Variant SKU: The stock keeping unit for the variant.
- Variant Grams: The weight of the variant in grams.
- Variant Price: The price of the variant.
- Variant Compare At Price: The original price of the variant, used for comparison.
- Variant Inventory Qty: Inventory quantity, where 0 indicates out of stock and 1 indicates in stock.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Variants:
- Variant Barcode: The barcode for the variant.
- Variant Tax Code: The tax code associated with the variant.
- Variant Weight Unit: The unit of weight measurement for the variant.

Images:
- Image Src: The source URL of the image.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Images:
- Image Alt Text: The alternative text for the image.

Shopify Spy извлича продукти от магазини, задвижвани от Shopify и ги запазва като Excel документ или CSV файл.

Промени през третото тримесечие на 2023 г.:
- Откачане на изскачащ прозорец: можете да използвате браузъра, докато скрейпингът е в ход и дори да скрейпвате няколко магазина едновременно
- Обновен процес на влизане

Функции на Shopify Spy:
✓ Може да извлече хиляди продукти в рамките на минути
✓ Филтриране по конкретна колекция
✓ Всички полета от списъка с продукти на Shopify са включени (вижте по-долу)
✓ Всички изображения на продуктите се добавят към CSV
✓ Експорт във формат CSV, съвместим с формат за импорт на Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Запазване като XLSX (Excel документ) с правилни типове данни - дати, цени
✓ Не изисква излишни разрешения

Защо Shopify Spy:

За собствениците на е-магазини, Shopify Spy ви позволява да следите продуктите, цените и промоциите на конкурентите си. С този инструмент можете бързо и лесно да извлечете хиляди продукти от магазини, задвижвани от Shopify и да ги филтрирате по конкретни колекции.

За дигиталните маркетолози, Shopify Spy предоставя точни и надеждни данни за продуктите, за да ви помогне да анализирате пазарните тенденции и да идентифицирате потенциални възможности за вашите клиенти.

За изследователите на продукти, Shopify Spy улеснява събирането на данни за голям брой продукти бързо и ефективно. Това означава, че можете да идентифицирате тенденции и виждания във вашата област на изследвания с лекота.

За дропшипъри, Shopify Spy е задължителен инструмент за откриване на нови продукти за добавяне към вашия магазин и за следене на цените и наличността на продуктите ви.

За анализаторите на данни, способността на Shopify Spy да извлича данни за продукти от магазини на Shopify и да ги запазва в CSV или Excel формат го прави атрактивен инструмент за бърза и ефективна обработка на големи количества данни.

Така че, независимо дали сте собственик на е-магазин, дигитален маркетолог, изследовател на продукти, дропшипър или анализатор на данни, Shopify Spy има всичко, от което се нуждаете, за да сте в крак с последните тенденции и виждания за продукти. Опитайте го днес и вдигнете бизнеса си на следващо ниво!

Поддържани полета:
- Заглавие
- Дръжка
- Описание (в обикновен текст)
- Дата и час на създаване
- Дата и час на обновяване
- Продавач
- Тип на продукта
- Етикети
- Максимална цена
- Минимална цена
- 5 варианта на продукта, включително заглавие, цена, цена с отстъпка и URL на изображението
- 10 изображения
- всички опции

Introducing the "Shopify Web Scraper", a powerful and efficient tool that revolutionizes the way you analyze and manage your e-commerce activities. As the name suggests, this chrome extension is designed to seamlessly scrape data from Shopify-powered stores, saving you time and effort.

"Shopify Web Scraper" is not just a tool, it's a game-changer for e-commerce store owners. With its ability to extract thousands of products within minutes, it delivers an unparalleled competitive edge. It allows you to keep a close eye on your rivals' products, pricing, and promotions, providing you with the data you need to stay ahead in the game.

The "Shopify Web Scraper" offers a plethora of features that make it a must-have tool for digital marketers. It provides accurate and reliable product data, which can be instrumental in analyzing market trends. This, in turn, can help you identify potential opportunities for your clients, making you their go-to strategist.

For product researchers, the "Shopify Web Scraper" is a boon. It allows you to gather data on a vast number of products quickly and efficiently. With the ability to filter by a specific collection, you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

The "Shopify Web Scraper" is also an essential tool for dropshippers. It enables you to discover new products to add to your store and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing inventory. 

Data analysts will find the "Shopify Web Scraper" particularly useful. It's the perfect tool for managing and processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently. It can extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format, ensuring your data is always organized and accessible.

The "Shopify Web Scraper" supports various fields, including title, handle, description (in plain text), created date and time, updated date and time, vendor, product type, tags, max price, min price, product variants including title, price, discount price, and image URL, images, and all options. 

2023 Q3 changes to the "Shopify Web Scraper" include an undock popup, which allows you to use your browser while the scraping is in progress. You can even scrape several stores simultaneously. It also features a renewed login flow, enhancing the overall user experience.

The "Shopify Web Scraper" does not require excessive permissions, making it a safe and reliable tool to use. It also ensures that all product images are added to the CSV, and can export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format.

In conclusion, the "Shopify Web Scraper" is a comprehensive tool for e-commerce store owners, digital marketers, product researchers, dropshippers, and data analysts. It offers everything you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try it out today and elevate your business to new heights!

"Shopify Spy শপিফাই পাওয়ারড দোকান থেকে পণ্য স্ক্র্যাপ করে এবং একটি এক্সেল নথি বা CSV ফাইল হিসাবে সংরক্ষণ করে।

2023 এর Q3 পরিবর্তন:
- Undock popup: স্ক্র্যাপিং চলাকালীন আপনি ব্রাউজার ব্যবহার করতে পারেন এবং এমনকি একসাথে বেশ কয়েকটি দোকান স্ক্র্যাপ করতে পারেন
- নবীকৃত লগইন ফ্লো

Shopify Spy বৈশিষ্ট্য:
✓ মিনিটের মধ্যে হাজার হাজার পণ্য বের করতে পারে
✓ নির্দিষ্ট সংগ্রহ দ্বারা ফিল্টার করা
✓ Shopify পণ্য তালিকা থেকে সমস্ত ক্ষেত্র অন্তর্ভুক্ত (নিচে দেখুন)
✓ সমস্ত পণ্যের ছবি CSV তে যোগ করা হয়
✓ CSV ফরম্যাটে রপ্তানি যা Shopify আমদানি ফরম্যাটের সাথে সামঞ্জস্যপূর্ণ (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ সঠিক ডাটা টাইপস - তারিখ, দাম সহ XLSX (এক্সেল নথি) হিসেবে সংরক্ষণ করুন
✓ অতিরিক্ত অনুমতি প্রয়োজন হয় না

Shopify Spy কেন:

ই-কমার্স দোকানের মালিকদের জন্য, Shopify Spy আপনাকে আপনার প্রতিযোগীদের পণ্য, মূল্য এবং প্রচারণা নজরে রাখার অনুমতি দেয়। এই টুলের সাহায্যে, আপনি দ্রুত এবং সহজে শপিফাই-পাওয়ারড দোকান থেকে হাজার হাজার পণ্য বের করতে পারেন এবং তাদেরকে নির্দিষ্ট সংগ্রহ দ্বারা ফিল্টার করতে পারেন।

ডিজিটাল মার্কেটারদের জন্য, Shopify Spy আপনার ক্লায়েন্টদের জন্য সম্ভাব্য সুযোগ চিহ্নিত করার জন্য বাজার ট্রেন্ড বিশ্লেষণ করতে সহায়তা করার জন্য সঠিক এবং নির্ভরযোগ্য পণ্য তথ্য সরবরাহ করে।

পণ্য গবেষকদের জন্য, Shopify Spy দ্রুত এবং কার্যকরীভাবে বড় পরিমাণে পণ্যের উপর ডাটা সংগ্রহ করা সহজ করে তোলে। এটি মানে আপনি আপনার গবেষণার ক্ষেত্রে ট্রেন্ড এবং অন্তর্দৃষ্টি চিহ্নিত করতে পারেন।

ড্রপশিপারদের জন্য, Shopify Spy আপনার দোকানে নতুন পণ্য যোগ করার জন্য এবং আপনার বিদ্যমান পণ্যের জন্য মূল্য এবং পণ্যের উপলব্ধতা পর্যবেক্ষণ করার একটি অপরিহার্য সরঞ্জাম।

ডাটা বিশ্লেষকদের জন্য, Shopify Spy এর শপিফাই দোকান থেকে পণ্যের ডাটা বের করার ক্ষমতা এবং তা একটি CSV বা এক্সেল ফরম্যাটে সংরক্ষণ করার ক্ষমতা তা দ্রুত এবং কার্যকরীভাবে বড় পরিমাণে ডাটা প্রক্রিয়া করার জন্য একটি আকর্ষণীয় সরঞ্জাম করে তোলে।

তাই, আপনি যদি একটি ই-কমার্স দোকানের মালিক, ডিজিটাল মার্কেটার, পণ্য গবেষক, ড্রপশিপার, বা ডাটা বিশ্লেষক হন, Shopify Spy আপনার পণ্যের সর্বশেষ ট্রেন্ড এবং অন্তর্দৃষ্টি নজরে রাখার জন্য আপনার প্রয়োজনীয় সব কিছু রয়েছে। আজই এটি চেষ্টা করুন এবং আপনার ব্যবসা পরবর্তী পর্যায়ে নিয়ে যান!

সমর্থিত ক্ষেত্রগুলি:
- শিরোনাম
- হ্যান্ডল
- বিবরণ (সাধারণ টেক্সটে)
- তৈরির তারিখ এবং সময়
- আপডেটের তারিখ এবং সময়
- বিক্রেতা
- পণ্যের ধরণ
- ট্যাগ
- সর্বাধিক মূল্য
- সর্বনিম্ন মূল্য
- শিরোনাম, মূল্য, ছাড়ের মূল্য এবং চিত্র URL সহ 5 টি পণ্য ভ্যারিয়েন্ট
- 10 টি ছবি
- সমস্ত বিকল্প

Característiques de Shopify Spy:
✓ Pot extreure milers de productes en minuts
✓ Filtrar per una col·lecció específica
✓ Tots els camps del llistat de productes de Shopify estan inclosos (vegeu a continuació)
✓ Totes les imatges dels productes s'afegeixen al CSV
✓ Exporta al format CSV compatible amb el format d'importació de Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Guarda com a XLSX (document Excel) amb tipus de dades adequats - dates, preus
✓ No requereix permisos excessius

Per què Shopify Spy:

Per als propietaris de botigues d'e-commerce, Shopify Spy us permet seguir els productes, preus i promocions dels vostres competidors. Amb aquesta eina, pots extreure ràpida i fàcilment milers de productes de botigues alimentades per Shopify i filtrar-los per col·leccions específiques.

Per als comercialitzadors digitals, Shopify Spy proporciona dades de productes precises i fiables per ajudar-vos a analitzar les tendències del mercat i identificar oportunitats potencials per als vostres clients.

Per als investigadors de productes, Shopify Spy facilita la recopilació de dades sobre un gran nombre de productes de manera ràpida i eficient. Això significa que pots identificar tendències i intuïcions en el teu camp de recerca amb facilitat.

Per als dropshippers, Shopify Spy és una eina essencial per trobar nous productes per afegir a la teva botiga, i monitoritzar els preus i la disponibilitat dels productes existents.

Per als analistes de dades, la capacitat de Shopify Spy per extreure dades de productes de les botigues de Shopify i guardar-les en format CSV o Excel la converteix en una eina atractiva per processar grans quantitats de dades de manera ràpida i eficient.

Així que, tant si ets propietari d'una botiga d'e-commerce, comercialitzador digital, investigador de productes, dropshipper o analista de dades, Shopify Spy té tot el que necessites per estar al dia de les últimes tendències i intuïcions de productes. Prova-ho avui i porta el teu negoci al següent nivell!

Camps suportats:
- Títol
- Maneta
- Descripció (en text pla)
- Data i hora de creació
- Data i hora d'actualització
- Venedor
- Tipus de producte
- Etiquetes
- Preu màxim
- Preu mínim
- 5 variants de producte incloent títol, preu, preu de descompte i URL de la imatge
- 10 imatges
- totes les opcions

Introducing "Scrape Shopify Stores," your ultimate toolkit for extracting valuable product data from Shopify-powered stores. This innovative Chrome extension is designed to scrape Shopify stores and save the extracted data as an Excel document or CSV file, providing you with a wealth of information to supercharge your e-commerce strategies.

In the dynamic world of e-commerce, staying ahead of your competitors is crucial. With "Scrape Shopify Stores," you can keep an eye on your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. This tool allows you to scrape thousands of products from Shopify stores and filter them by specific collections. This feature is designed to help you gain a competitive edge and stay ahead in your business endeavors. 

Digital marketers will find "Scrape Shopify Stores" a game-changer. It provides accurate and reliable product data, enabling you to analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients. By using this tool to scrape Shopify stores, you can gather valuable insights to help your clients improve their product offerings and marketing strategies. 

For product researchers, "Scrape Shopify Stores" is a boon. It enables you to scrape Shopify stores and gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. With this tool, you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease, helping you to make data-driven decisions.

Dropshippers, "Scrape Shopify Stores" is your secret weapon. Use it to scrape Shopify stores and find new products to add to your store. Moreover, you can monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products, ensuring you always stay in the loop.

Data analysts, meet your new best friend. "Scrape Shopify Stores" allows you to scrape Shopify stores and extract product data, saving it in a CSV or Excel format. This feature makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently, streamlining your data analysis tasks.

The "Scrape Shopify Stores" extension supports various fields, including title, handle, description, created date and time, updated date and time, vendor, product type, tags, max price, min price, product variants, and images. This comprehensive data extraction ensures you have all the information you need at your fingertips.

Moreover, "Scrape Shopify Stores" does not require excessive permissions, ensuring your data security while providing you with the data you need. In addition, the 2023 Q3 changes include an undock popup, allowing you to use your browser while the scraping is in progress and even scrape several stores simultaneously, and a renewed login flow.

In short, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, a digital marketer, a product researcher, a dropshipper, or a data analyst, "Scrape Shopify Stores" is the ultimate tool you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. So, why wait? Try it out today and take your business to the next level!

Shopify Spy scrapes products from Shopify powered stores and saves as an Excel document or CSV file.

2024 Q3 changes:
- Download a single product
- Display some store metadata
- Better handling if errors

2024 Q2 changes:
- Highly requested feature: Downloading images.
- Slow mode: Extract more fields but slower: Variant Barcode, Image Alt Text, Variant Tax Code, Variant Weight Unit
- Old "Excel" format has been renamed to "Excel (Legacy)" and will be removed in further releases
- Option to manually specify a collection handle if the list of collections is too large.
- Enhanced error handling with clearer explanations

2024 Q1 changes:
- Resolved "Out of memory" error for large stores; now, CSV/Excel files are automatically split for efficient data handling.
- Improved status messages for enhanced clarity and precision.

2023 Q3-Q4 changes:
- Undock popup: you can use browser while the scraping is in progress and even scrape several store simultaneously
- Renewed login flow

✓ Can extract thousands of products within minutes
✓ Filter by a specific collection
✓ All fields from Shopify product listing are included (see below)
✓ All product images are added to the CSV
✓ Download images along with CSV
✓ Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Save as XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices
✓ Does not require excessive permissions

Why Shopify Spy:

Supported Fields:
- Handle: The unique identifier for the product.
- Title: The name of the product.
- Body (HTML): The HTML description of the product.
- Vendor: The name of the product's vendor.
- Product Type: The category or type of the product.
- Tags: Keywords associated with the product.
- Published: Indicates whether the product is published or unpublished.

Options:
- Option Name
- Option Value

Variants:
- Variant SKU: The stock keeping unit for the variant.
- Variant Grams: The weight of the variant in grams.
- Variant Price: The price of the variant.
- Variant Compare At Price: The original price of the variant, used for comparison.
- Variant Inventory Qty: Inventory quantity, where 0 indicates out of stock and 1 indicates in stock.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Variants:
- Variant Barcode: The barcode for the variant.
- Variant Tax Code: The tax code associated with the variant.
- Variant Weight Unit: The unit of weight measurement for the variant.

Images:
- Image Src: The source URL of the image.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Images:
- Image Alt Text: The alternative text for the image.

Shopify Spy extrahuje produkty z obchodů poháněných Shopify a ukládá je jako dokument Excel nebo soubor CSV.

Změny v Q3 2023:
- Odpojit vyskakovací okno: můžete používat prohlížeč, zatímco probíhá extrakce a dokonce extrahovat z několika obchodů současně
- Obnovený přihlašovací proces

Funkce Shopify Spy:
✓ Dokáže extrahovat tisíce produktů během několika minut
✓ Filtr podle konkrétní kolekce
✓ Jsou zahrnuta všechna pole z produktového seznamu Shopify (viz níže)
✓ Všechny obrázky produktů jsou přidány do CSV
✓ Export do formátu CSV kompatibilního s formátem importu Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Uložit jako XLSX (dokument Excel) s správnými datovými typy - data, ceny
✓ Nevyžaduje nadměrná oprávnění

Proč Shopify Spy:

Pro majitele e-commerce obchodů umožňuje Shopify Spy sledovat produkty, ceny a akce vašich konkurentů. S tímto nástrojem můžete rychle a snadno extrahovat tisíce produktů z obchodů poháněných Shopify a filtrovat je podle konkrétních kolekcí.

Pro digitální marketéry poskytuje Shopify Spy přesná a spolehlivá data o produktech, která vám pomohou analyzovat tržní trendy a identifikovat potenciální příležitosti pro vaše klienty.

Pro výzkumníky produktů usnadňuje Shopify Spy shromažďování dat o velkém množství produktů rychle a efektivně. To znamená, že můžete snadno identifikovat trendy a poznatky ve vašem oboru.

Pro dropshippery je Shopify Spy nezbytným nástrojem pro hledání nových produktů, které můžete přidat do svého obchodu, a monitorování cen a dostupnosti produktů.

Pro analytiky dat je schopnost Shopify Spy extrahovat data o produktech z obchodů Shopify a uložit je ve formátu CSV nebo Excel atraktivním nástrojem pro zpracování velkých objemů dat rychle a efektivně.

Ať už jste majitelem e-commerce obchodu, digitálním marketérem, výzkumníkem produktů, dropshipperem nebo analytikem dat, Shopify Spy má vše, co potřebujete, abyste byli v obraze o nejnovějších trendech a poznatcích produktů. Vyzkoušejte to ještě dnes a posuňte svůj podnik na vyšší úroveň!

Podporovaná pole:
- Název
- Ovladač
- Popis (v čistém textu)
- Datum a čas vytvoření
- Datum a čas aktualizace
- Prodejce
- Typ produktu
- Štítky
- Maximální cena
- Minimální cena
- 5 variant produktů včetně názvu, ceny, slevové ceny a URL obrázku
- 10 obrázků
- všechny možnosti

Shopify Spy skraber produkter fra Shopify-drevne butikker og gemmer som et Excel-dokument eller CSV-fil.

Ændringer i 2023 Q3:
- Frigør popup: du kan bruge browseren, mens skrabningen er i gang, og endda skrabe flere butikker samtidigt
- Fornyet login-flow

Shopify Spy-funktioner:
✓ Kan ekstrahere tusindvis af produkter inden for få minutter
✓ Filtrer efter en bestemt samling
✓ Alle felter fra Shopify produktliste er inkluderet (se nedenfor)
✓ Alle produktbilleder tilføjes til CSV
✓ Eksport til CSV-format kompatibelt med Shopify importformat (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Gem som XLSX (Excel-dokument) med korrekte datatyper - datoer, priser
✓ Kræver ikke overdreven tilladelser

Hvorfor Shopify Spy:

For ejere af e-handelsbutikker giver Shopify Spy dig mulighed for at holde styr på dine konkurrenters produkter, priser og kampagner. Med dette værktøj kan du hurtigt og nemt ekstrahere tusindvis af produkter fra Shopify-drevne butikker og filtrere dem efter specifikke samlinger.

For digitale marketingfolk giver Shopify Spy nøjagtige og pålidelige produktdata til at hjælpe dig med at analysere markedstendenser og identificere potentielle muligheder for dine klienter.

For produktforskere gør Shopify Spy det let at indsamle data om et stort antal produkter hurtigt og effektivt. Det betyder, at du nemt kan identificere tendenser og indsigter i dit forskningsområde.

For dropshippere er Shopify Spy et væsentligt værktøj til at finde nye produkter at tilføje til din butik, og overvåge priser og produkttilgængelighed for dine eksisterende produkter.

For dataanalytikere gør Shopify Spy's evne til at ekstrahere produktdata fra Shopify-butikker og gemme det i et CSV- eller Excel-format det til et attraktivt værktøj til hurtig og effektiv behandling af store mængder data.

Så uanset om du er en e-handelsbutiksejer, digital marketingfolk, produktforsker, dropshipper eller dataanalytiker, har Shopify Spy alt, hvad du har brug for at holde dig ajour med de seneste produkttendenser og indsigter. Prøv det i dag og tag din virksomhed til det næste niveau!

Understøttede felter:
- Titel
- Håndtag
- Beskrivelse (i klartekst)
- Oprettet dato og tid
- Opdateret dato og tid
- Leverandør
- Produkttype
- Tags
- Maksimal pris
- Minimal pris
- 5 produktvarianter inklusiv titel, pris, rabatpris og billed-URL
- 10 billeder
- alle muligheder

Shopify Spy durchsucht Produkte von Shopify-basierten Geschäften und speichert sie als Excel-Dokument oder CSV-Datei.

Änderungen im 3. Quartal 2023:
- Abkoppeln des Popups: Sie können den Browser während des Scrapings weiterhin nutzen und sogar mehrere Geschäfte gleichzeitig durchsuchen
- Erneuerter Login-Prozess

Funktionen von Shopify Spy:
✓ Kann innerhalb von Minuten Tausende von Produkten extrahieren
✓ Filtern nach einer bestimmten Kollektion
✓ Alle Felder aus der Shopify-Produktliste sind enthalten (siehe unten)
✓ Alle Produktbilder werden zur CSV hinzugefügt
✓ Export im CSV-Format, kompatibel mit dem Shopify-Importformat (https://help.shopify.com/de/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Speichern als XLSX (Excel-Dokument) mit korrekten Datentypen - Daten, Preise
✓ Benötigt keine übermäßigen Berechtigungen

Warum Shopify Spy:

Für E-Commerce-Shop-Besitzer ermöglicht Shopify Spy die Überwachung der Produkte, Preise und Aktionen Ihrer Wettbewerber. Mit diesem Tool können Sie schnell und einfach Tausende von Produkten aus Shopify-basierten Geschäften extrahieren und nach bestimmten Kollektionen filtern.

Für digitale Vermarkter liefert Shopify Spy genaue und zuverlässige Produktdaten, um Markttrends zu analysieren und potenzielle Gelegenheiten für Ihre Kunden zu identifizieren.

Für Produktforscher erleichtert Shopify Spy das Sammeln von Daten zu einer großen Anzahl von Produkten schnell und effizient. Dies bedeutet, dass Sie Trends und Erkenntnisse in Ihrem Forschungsbereich mit Leichtigkeit identifizieren können.

Für Dropshipper ist Shopify Spy ein unverzichtbares Tool, um neue Produkte für Ihren Shop zu finden und die Preise und Verfügbarkeit Ihrer bestehenden Produkte zu überwachen.

Für Datenanalysten macht die Fähigkeit von Shopify Spy, Produktdaten aus Shopify-Geschäften zu extrahieren und in einem CSV- oder Excel-Format zu speichern, es zu einem attraktiven Tool für die schnelle und effiziente Verarbeitung großer Datenmengen.

Ob Sie also ein E-Commerce-Shop-Besitzer, digitaler Vermarkter, Produktforscher, Dropshipper oder Datenanalyst sind, Shopify Spy bietet alles, was Sie brauchen, um auf dem neuesten Stand der Produktrends und -erkenntnisse zu bleiben. Probieren Sie es heute aus und bringen Sie Ihr Geschäft auf die nächste Stufe!

Unterstützte Felder:
- Titel
- Handle
- Beschreibung (in Klartext)
- Erstellungsdatum und -zeit
- Aktualisierungsdatum und -zeit
- Anbieter
- Produkttyp
- Tags
- Höchstpreis
- Mindestpreis
- 5 Produktvarianten einschließlich Titel, Preis, Rabattpreis und Bild-URL
- 10 Bilder
- alle Optionen
long.el:
Shopify Spy scrapes products from Shopify powered stores and saves as an Excel document or CSV file.

2024 Q3 changes:
- Download a single product
- Display some store metadata
- Better handling if errors

2024 Q2 changes:
- Highly requested feature: Downloading images.
- Slow mode: Extract more fields but slower: Variant Barcode, Image Alt Text, Variant Tax Code, Variant Weight Unit
- Old "Excel" format has been renamed to "Excel (Legacy)" and will be removed in further releases
- Option to manually specify a collection handle if the list of collections is too large.
- Enhanced error handling with clearer explanations

2024 Q1 changes:
- Resolved "Out of memory" error for large stores; now, CSV/Excel files are automatically split for efficient data handling.
- Improved status messages for enhanced clarity and precision.

2023 Q3-Q4 changes:
- Undock popup: you can use browser while the scraping is in progress and even scrape several store simultaneously
- Renewed login flow

Shopify Spy features:
✓ Can extract thousands of products within minutes
✓ Filter by a specific collection
✓ All fields from Shopify product listing are included (see below)
✓ All product images are added to the CSV
✓ Download images along with CSV
✓ Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Save as XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices
✓ Does not require excessive permissions

Why Shopify Spy:

For e-commerce store owners, Shopify Spy allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. With this tool, you can quickly and easily extract thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores and filter them by specific collections.

For digital marketers, Shopify Spy provides accurate and reliable product data to help you analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients.

For product researchers, Shopify Spy makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. This means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

For dropshippers, Shopify Spy is an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store, and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products.

For data analysts, Shopify Spy's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

So, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, Shopify Spy has everything you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try it out today and take your business to the next level!

Supported Fields:
- Handle: The unique identifier for the product.
- Title: The name of the product.
- Body (HTML): The HTML description of the product.
- Vendor: The name of the product's vendor.
- Product Type: The category or type of the product.
- Tags: Keywords associated with the product.
- Published: Indicates whether the product is published or unpublished.

Options:
- Option Name
- Option Value

Variants:
- Variant SKU: The stock keeping unit for the variant.
- Variant Grams: The weight of the variant in grams.
- Variant Price: The price of the variant.
- Variant Compare At Price: The original price of the variant, used for comparison.
- Variant Inventory Qty: Inventory quantity, where 0 indicates out of stock and 1 indicates in stock.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Variants:
- Variant Barcode: The barcode for the variant.
- Variant Tax Code: The tax code associated with the variant.
- Variant Weight Unit: The unit of weight measurement for the variant.

Images:
- Image Src: The source URL of the image.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Images:
- Image Alt Text: The alternative text for the image.

Το Shopify Spy αντλεί προϊόντα από καταστήματα που λειτουργούν με Shopify και τα αποθηκεύει ως έγγραφο Excel ή αρχείο CSV.

Αλλαγές 2023 Q3:
- Αποσύνδεση αναδυόμενου παραθύρου: μπορείτε να χρησιμοποιήσετε τον περιηγητή ενώ βρίσκεται σε εξέλιξη η αντληση δεδομένων και ακόμη και να αντλήσετε δεδομένα από αρκετά καταστήματα ταυτόχρονα
- Ανανεωμένη ροή σύνδεσης

Χαρακτηριστικά του Shopify Spy:
✓ Μπορεί να εξάγει χιλιάδες προϊόντα εντός λίγων λεπτών
✓ Φιλτράρισμα βάσει συγκεκριμένης συλλογής
✓ Συμπεριλαμβάνονται όλα τα πεδία από την καταχώρηση προϊόντων του Shopify (δείτε παρακάτω)
✓ Όλες οι εικόνες προϊόντων προστίθενται στο CSV
✓ Εξαγωγή σε μορφή CSV συμβατή με τη μορφή εισαγωγής του Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Αποθήκευση ως XLSX (έγγραφο Excel) με τους κατάλληλους τύπους δεδομένων - ημερομηνίες, τιμές
✓ Δεν απαιτεί υπερβολικά δικαιώματα

Γιατί το Shopify Spy:

Για τους ιδιοκτήτες καταστημάτων ηλεκτρονικού εμπορίου, το Shopify Spy σας επιτρέπει να παρακολουθείτε τα προϊόντα, τις τιμές και τις προωθήσεις των ανταγωνιστών σας. Με αυτό το εργαλείο, μπορείτε γρήγορα και εύκολα να εξάγετε χιλιάδες προϊόντα από καταστήματα που λειτουργούν με Shopify και να τα φιλτράρετε με βάση συγκεκριμένες συλλογές.

Για ψηφιακούς marketers, το Shopify Spy παρέχει ακριβή και αξιόπιστα δεδομένα προϊόντων για να σας βοηθήσει να αναλύσετε τις τάσεις της αγοράς και να εντοπίσετε πιθανές ευκαιρίες για τους πελάτες σας.

Για ερευνητές προϊόντων, το Shopify Spy διευκολύνει τη συλλογή δεδομένων για μεγάλο αριθμό προϊόντων γρήγορα και αποτελεσματικά. Αυτό σημαίνει ότι μπορείτε να εντοπίσετε τάσεις και επιφυλάξεις στον τομέα της έρευνάς σας με ευκολία.

Για dropshippers, το Shopify Spy είναι ένα απαραίτητο εργαλείο για την εύρεση νέων προϊόντων για να προσθέσετε στο κατάστημά σας, και την παρακολούθηση των τιμών και της διαθεσιμότητας προϊόντων για τα υπάρχοντα προϊόντα σας.

Για αναλυτές δεδομένων, η ικανότητα του Shopify Spy να εξάγει δεδομένα προϊόντων από καταστήματα Shopify και να τα αποθηκεύει σε μορφή CSV ή Excel, το καθιστά ένα ελκυστικό εργαλείο για την επεξεργασία μεγάλων ποσοτήτων δεδομένων γρήγορα και αποτελεσματικά.

Έτσι, είτε είστε ιδιοκτήτης καταστήματος ηλεκτρονικού εμπορίου, ψηφιακός marketer, ερευνητής προϊόντων, dropshipper ή αναλυτής δεδομένων, το Shopify Spy έχει όλα όσα χρειάζεστε για να παραμείνετε ενήμεροι για τις τελευταίες τάσεις και επιφυλάξεις προϊόντων. Δοκιμάστε το σήμερα και αναβαθμίστε την επιχείρησή σας!

Υποστηριζόμενα πεδία:
- Τίτλος
- Λαβή
- Περιγραφή (σε απλό κείμενο)
- Ημερομηνία και ώρα δημιουργίας
- Ημερομηνία και ώρα ενημέρωσης
- Προμηθευτής
- Τύπος προϊόντος
- Ετικέτες
- Μέγιστη τιμή
- Ελάχιστη τιμή
- 5 παραλλαγές προϊόντων, συμπεριλαμβανομένου του τίτλου, της τιμής, της τιμής έκπτωσης και της διεύθυνσης URL της εικόνας
- 10 εικόνες
- όλες οι επιλογές

Shopify Spy raspa productos de tiendas impulsadas por Shopify y los guarda como un documento de Excel o archivo CSV.

Cambios en el tercer trimestre de 2023:
- Ventana emergente desacoplada: puedes usar el navegador mientras el raspado está en progreso e incluso raspar varias tiendas simultáneamente
- Flujo de inicio de sesión renovado

Características de Shopify Spy:
✓ Puede extraer miles de productos en minutos
✓ Filtrar por una colección específica
✓ Todos los campos del listado de productos de Shopify están incluidos (ver abajo)
✓ Todas las imágenes del producto se agregan al CSV
✓ Exportar a formato CSV compatible con el formato de importación de Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Guardar como XLSX (documento de Excel) con tipos de datos adecuados: fechas, precios
✓ No requiere permisos excesivos

Por qué Shopify Spy:

Para los dueños de tiendas de comercio electrónico, Shopify Spy te permite hacer un seguimiento de los productos, precios y promociones de tus competidores. Con esta herramienta, puedes extraer rápida y fácilmente miles de productos de tiendas impulsadas por Shopify y filtrarlos por colecciones específicas.

Para los especialistas en marketing digital, Shopify Spy proporciona datos de productos precisos y confiables para ayudarte a analizar las tendencias del mercado e identificar oportunidades potenciales para tus clientes.

Para los investigadores de productos, Shopify Spy facilita la recolección de datos sobre una gran cantidad de productos de manera rápida y eficiente. Esto significa que puedes identificar tendencias e ideas en tu campo de investigación con facilidad.

Para los dropshippers, Shopify Spy es una herramienta esencial para encontrar nuevos productos para agregar a tu tienda y monitorear los precios y la disponibilidad de productos para tus productos existentes.

Para los analistas de datos, la capacidad de Shopify Spy para extraer datos de productos de las tiendas Shopify y guardarlos en un formato CSV o Excel lo convierte en una herramienta atractiva para procesar grandes cantidades de datos de manera rápida y eficiente.

Por lo tanto, ya seas el dueño de una tienda de comercio electrónico, un especialista en marketing digital, un investigador de productos, un dropshipper o un analista de datos, Shopify Spy tiene todo lo que necesitas para estar al tanto de las últimas tendencias e ideas de productos. ¡Pruébalo hoy mismo y lleva tu negocio al siguiente nivel!

Campos compatibles:
- Título
- Mango
- Descripción (en texto plano)
- Fecha y hora de creación
- Fecha y hora de actualización
- Vendedor
- Tipo de producto
- Etiquetas
- Precio máximo
- Precio mínimo
- 5 variantes de producto incluyendo título, precio, precio de descuento y URL de la imagen
- 10 imágenes
- todas las opciones

Why Shopify Spy:

For e-commerce store owners, Shopify Spy allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. With this tool, you can quickly and easily extract thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores and filter them by specific collections.

For digital marketers, Shopify Spy provides accurate and reliable product data to help you analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients.

For product researchers, Shopify Spy makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. This means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

Shopify Spy kraabib tooteid Shopify toetatud poodidest ja salvestab need Exceli dokumenti või CSV faili.

2023 Q3 muudatused:
- Vabasta hüpikaken: saate veebilehitsejat kasutada kraapimise ajal ja isegi kraapida mitu poodi korraga
- Uuendatud sisselogimisvoog

Shopify Spy omadused:
✓ Saab mõne minutiga eraldada tuhandeid tooteid
✓ Filtritakse konkreetse kollektsiooni järgi
✓ Kõik Shopify toote loendis olevad väljad on kaasatud (vt allpool)
✓ Kõik toote pildid lisatakse CSV-sse
✓ Ekspordi CSV-vormingus, mis ühildub Shopify impordivorminguga (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Salvesta kui XLSX (Exceli dokument) korrektsete andmetüüpidega - kuupäevad, hinnad
✓ Ei nõua liigsete õiguste andmist

Miks Shopify Spy:

E-kaubanduse kaupluse omanikele võimaldab Shopify Spy jälgida oma konkurentide tooteid, hindu ja sooduspakkumisi. Selle tööriistaga saate kiiresti ja hõlpsalt eraldada tuhandeid tooteid Shopify toetatud poodidest ja filtreerida neid konkreetsete kollektsioonide järgi.

Digitaalsetele turundajatele pakub Shopify Spy täpseid ja usaldusväärseid tooteandmeid, mis aitavad analüüsida turutrende ja tuvastada potentsiaalseid võimalusi teie klientidele.

Tooteuuringute tegijatele muudab Shopify Spy suure hulga toodete andmete kiireks ja tõhusaks kogumiseks lihtsaks. See tähendab, et saate hõlpsasti tuvastada trende ja teadmisi oma uurimisvaldkonnas.

Dropshipperitele on Shopify Spy oluline tööriist uute toodete leidmiseks, mida oma poodi lisada, ning olemasolevate toodete hindade ja saadavuse jälgimiseks.

Andmeanalüütikutele muudab Shopify Spy võime eraldada tooteandmeid Shopify poodidest ja salvestada see CSV- või Exceli formaadis suurte andmehulkade kiireks ja tõhusaks töötlemiseks atraktiivseks tööriistaks.

Nii et, olgu te e-kaubanduse kaupluse omanik, digitaalne turundaja, tooteuuringute tegija, dropshipper või andmeanalüütik, on Shopify Spy-l kõik, mida vajate, et olla kursis viimaste tootetrendide ja teadmistega. Proovige seda juba täna ja viige oma äri järgmisele tasemele!

- Müüja

- Sildid
- Maksimaalne hind
- Minimaalne hind
- 5 toote varianti, sealhulgas pealkiri, hind, allahindlusega hind ja pildi URL
- 10 pilti
- kõik valikud

Shopify Spy محصولات را از فروشگاه‌های مبتنی بر Shopify برداشت می‌کند و آن‌ها را به عنوان سند Excel یا فایل CSV ذخیره می‌کند.

تغییرات Q3 2023:
- پاپ‌آپ را از داک خارج کنید: شما می‌توانید در حالی که برداشت در حال انجام است، از مرورگر استفاده کنید و حتی چندین فروشگاه را به طور همزمان برداشت کنید
- جریان ورود به سیستم تجدید شده

ویژگی‌های Shopify Spy:
✓ می‌تواند هزاران محصول را در عرض دقایق برداشت کند
✓ فیلتر براساس یک مجموعه خاص
✓ تمامی فیلدهای لیست محصول Shopify شامل می‌شوند (در زیر ببینید)
✓ تمام تصاویر محصول به CSV اضافه می‌شوند
✓ صادرات به فرمت CSV سازگار با فرمت ورودی Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ ذخیره به عنوان XLSX (سند Excel) با انواع داده‌های مناسب - تاریخ‌ها، قیمت‌ها
✓ نیازی به دسترسی‌های بی‌اعتدال ندارد

چرا Shopify Spy:

برای صاحبان فروشگاه الکترونیکی، Shopify Spy امکان ردیابی محصولات، قیمت‌ها و تبلیغات رقبای شما را فراهم می‌کند. با این ابزار، شما می‌توانید به سرعت و آسانی هزاران محصول را از فروشگاه‌های مبتنی بر Shopify برداشت کنید و آن‌ها را براساس مجموعه‌های خاص فیلتر کنید.

برای بازاریابان دیجیتال، Shopify Spy داده‌های دقیق و قابل اتکا محصول را برای کمک به شما در تجزیه و تحلیل روندهای بازار و شناسایی فرصت‌های بالقوه برای مشتریانتان فراهم می‌کند.

برای پژوهشگران محصول، Shopify Spy جمع‌آوری داده‌ها در مورد تعداد زیادی از محصولات را به سرعت و با کارایی بالا آسان می‌کند. این به معنی این است که شما می‌توانید با آسانی روندها و بینش‌ها را در حوزه تحقیقات خود شناسایی کنید.

برای کسانی که در سیستم Dropshipping کار می‌کنند، Shopify Spy یک ابزار ضروری برای پیدا کردن محصولات جدید برای اضافه کردن به فروشگاه شما است و قیمت‌ها و دسترسی به محصولات موجود را نظارت می‌کند.

برای تحلیلگران داده، توانایی Shopify Spy در برداشت داده‌های محصول از فروشگاه‌های Shopify و ذخیره آن‌ها در فرمت CSV یا Excel آن را یک ابزار جذاب برای پردازش مقادیر زیادی از داده‌ها به سرعت و با کارایی بالا می‌کند.

پس، چه شما صاحب فروشگاه الکترونیکی، بازاریاب دیجیتال، پژوهشگر محصول، کاربر سیستم Dropshipping یا تحلیلگر داده باشید، Shopify Spy همه چیزی را که برای دستیابی به آخرین روندها و بینش‌های محصول نیاز دارید، فراهم می‌کند. امروز آن را امتحان کنید و کسب و کار خود را به سطح بعدی ببرید!

- فروشنده
- نوع محصول
- برچسب‌ها
- حداکثر قیمت
- حداقل قیمت

- تمام گزینه‌ها

Introducing "Shopify Spy Scraper & Parser" - your new secret weapon in the e-commerce world. This advanced Chrome extension revolutionizes the way you scrape and parse data from Shopify-powered stores. With the Shopify Spy Scraper & Parser, you can extract thousands of products within minutes, all while continuing to use your browser and even scrape multiple stores simultaneously.

**2023 Q3 Changes:**
- Undock popup: This feature allows you to multitask like never before. Use your browser while the scraping is in progress and even scrape several stores at the same time. 
- Renewed login flow: A smooth and streamlined login process for a seamless user experience.

**Shopify Spy Scraper & Parser Features:**
- Can extract thousands of products within minutes: Shopify Spy lets you quickly and easily extract an impressive amount of data in a short time.
- Filter by a specific collection: Focus on what truly matters to you with the Shopify Spy's advanced filter.
- All fields from Shopify product listing are included: Get comprehensive data with every scrape.
- All product images are added to the CSV: Visuals are crucial, and Shopify Spy ensures you have all the images you need.
- Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format: Shopify Spy makes it easy to integrate the scraped data back into Shopify.
- Save as XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices: Organize your data efficiently with Shopify Spy's Excel export option.
- Does not require excessive permissions: Shopify Spy respects your privacy and only requests necessary permissions.

**Why Choose Shopify Spy Scraper & Parser?**
Shopify Spy is the ultimate tool for e-commerce store owners, digital marketers, product researchers, dropshippers, and data analysts. It allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions, providing accurate and reliable product data to help you analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities. 

For product researchers, Shopify Spy makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. This means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease. 

Dropshippers will find Shopify Spy an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products. 

Data analysts will appreciate Shopify Spy's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format, making it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

**Supported fields:**
Shopify Spy supports a wide range of data fields including Title, Handle, Description (in plain text), Created date and time, Updated date and time, Vendor, Product Type, Tags, Max price, Min price, 5 product variants including title, price, discount price, and image URL, 10 images, and all options.

So, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, Shopify Spy Scraper & Parser has everything you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try it out today and take your business to the next level with Shopify Spy!

Shopify Spy kaapi tuotteita Shopifyn käyttämistä kaupoista ja tallentaa ne Excel-dokumenttiin tai CSV-tiedostoon.

2023 Q3 muutokset:
- Irrota ponnahdusikkuna: voit käyttää selainta samalla kun kaavinta on käynnissä ja jopa kaapia useita kauppoja samanaikaisesti
- Uudistettu kirjautumisvirta

Shopify Spy -ominaisuudet:
✓ Voi kaapia tuhansia tuotteita minuuteissa
✓ Suodatus tietyn kokoelman mukaan
✓ Kaikki kentät Shopify-tuotelistauksesta sisältyvät (katso alla)
✓ Kaikki tuotekuvat lisätään CSV-tiedostoon
✓ Vienti CSV-muodossa, joka on yhteensopiva Shopify-tuontimuodon kanssa (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Tallenna XLSX-muodossa (Excel-dokumentti) oikeilla datatyypeillä - päivämäärät, hinnat
✓ Ei vaadi liiallisia oikeuksia

Miksi Shopify Spy:

Verkkokaupan omistajille Shopify Spy mahdollistaa kilpailijoidesi tuotteiden, hintojen ja tarjousten seurannan. Tällä työkalulla voit nopeasti ja helposti kaapia tuhansia tuotteita Shopify-kaupoista ja suodattaa ne tiettyjen kokoelmien mukaan.

Digitaalisille markkinoijille Shopify Spy tarjoaa tarkkoja ja luotettavia tuotetietoja, joiden avulla voit analysoida markkinatrendejä ja tunnistaa mahdollisia mahdollisuuksia asiakkaillesi.

Tuotetutkijoille Shopify Spy tekee suuren määrän tuotteiden tietojen keräämisestä nopeasti ja tehokkaasti helppoa. Tämä tarkoittaa, että voit tunnistaa trendejä ja oivalluksia tutkimusalallasi helposti.

Pudotuslaivureille Shopify Spy on olennainen työkalu uusien tuotteiden löytämiseksi kauppaasi ja nykyisten tuotteidesi hinnoittelun ja saatavuuden seuraamiseksi.

Tietoanalyytikoille Shopify Spyn kyky kaapia tuotetietoja Shopify-kaupoista ja tallentaa ne CSV- tai Excel-muodossa tekee siitä houkuttelevan työkalun suurten datamäärien nopeaan ja tehokkaaseen käsittelyyn.

Joten, olitpa sitten verkkokaupan omistaja, digitaalinen markkinoija, tuotetutkija, pudotuslaivuri tai tietoanalyytikko, Shopify Spy sisältää kaiken tarvitsemasi pysyäksesi ajan tasalla uusimmista tuotetrendeistä ja oivalluksista. Kokeile sitä tänään ja vie yrityksesi seuraavalle tasolle!

- Suurin hinta
- Pienin hinta

Mga pagbabago ng 2023 Q3:
- Undock popup: maaari kang gumamit ng browser habang ang scraping ay kasalukuyang nagaganap at maaaring mag-scrape ng ilang tindahan nang sabay-sabay

✓ Kasama ang lahat ng mga field mula sa listahan ng produkto ng Shopify (tingnan sa ibaba)
✓ Idinagdag ang lahat ng mga larawan ng produkto sa CSV
✓ I-export sa format ng CSV na kompatibol sa format ng pag-import ng Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ I-save bilang XLSX (dokumento ng Excel) na may tamang mga uri ng data - mga petsa, mga presyo
✓ Hindi nangangailangan ng labis na mga pahintulot

Bakit Shopify Spy:

Para sa mga may-ari ng e-commerce store, ang Shopify Spy ay nagbibigay-daan sa iyo na subaybayan ang mga produkto ng iyong mga kalaban, presyo, at mga promosyon. Gamit ang tool na ito, maaari kang mabilis at madaling mag-extract ng libo-libong mga produkto mula sa mga tindahan na pinapatakbo ng Shopify at i-filter ang mga ito sa pamamagitan ng tiyak na mga koleksyon.

Para sa mga digital marketer, ang Shopify Spy ay nagbibigay ng tumpak at maaasahang data ng produkto upang matulungan kang suriin ang mga trend ng merkado at makilala ang mga potensyal na oportunidad para sa iyong mga kliyente.

Para sa mga product researcher, ginagawang madali ng Shopify Spy ang pagtitipon ng data sa isang malaking bilang ng mga produkto nang mabilis at mahusay. Ito ay nangangahulugan na maaari kang makakilala ng mga trend at pananaw sa iyong larangan ng pananaliksik nang madali.

Para sa mga dropshipper, ang Shopify Spy ay isang mahalagang tool para sa paghahanap ng mga bagong produkto na idagdag sa iyong tindahan, at subaybayan ang pagpepresyo at availability ng produkto para sa iyong mga umiiral na produkto.

Para sa mga data analyst, ang kakayahan ng Shopify Spy na mag-extract ng data ng produkto mula sa mga tindahan ng Shopify at i-save ito sa isang CSV o format ng Excel ay ginagawang isang kaakit-akit na tool para sa pagpoproseso ng malalaking halaga ng data nang mabilis at mahusay.

Kaya, kung ikaw ay isang may-ari ng e-commerce store, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, o data analyst, ang Shopify Spy ay mayroong lahat ng kailangan mo upang manatiling nasa itaas ng mga pinakabagong trend ng produkto at pananaw. Subukan ito ngayon at dalhin ang iyong negosyo sa susunod na antas!

Mga suportadong field:
- Pamagat
- Handle
- Paglalarawan (sa plain text)
- Petsa at oras ng paglikha
- Petsa at oras ng pag-update
- Vendor
- Uri ng Produkto
- Mga Tag
- Pinakamataas na presyo
- Pinakamababang presyo
- 5 mga variant ng produkto kabilang ang pamagat, presyo, presyo ng diskwento, at URL ng larawan
- 10 mga larawan
- lahat ng mga opsyon

Introducing the revolutionary Chrome extension, "Shopify Spy Product," a powerful tool designed to provide an efficient and effective way to keep an eye on the competition. This extension will redefine the way you conduct business, by scraping products from Shopify powered stores and saving them as an Excel document or CSV file.

The Shopify Spy Product is not just a tool, but a game-changer. With the ability to extract thousands of products within mere minutes, it's like having your very own digital spy. Filter by specific collections to refine your search, making it easier than ever to stay ahead of the competition. 

One of the key features of the Shopify Spy Product is the inclusion of all fields from the Shopify product listing. This means you get all the information you need, from product titles to vendor details, right at your fingertips. Additionally, all product images are added to the CSV, providing a comprehensive overview of what's on offer.

The Shopify Spy Product extension is designed for versatility. Whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, this tool is built to cater to your individual needs. 

As an e-commerce store owner, the Shopify Spy Product extension allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. This means you can stay one step ahead, ensuring your business remains competitive.

For the digital marketers out there, Shopify Spy Product provides accurate and reliable product data. This invaluable information allows you to analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients.

Product researchers will find the Shopify Spy Product extension particularly useful. With its ability to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently, you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

For dropshippers, Shopify Spy Product is an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store. It also allows you to monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products, ensuring you always stay ahead of the game.

Data analysts will appreciate the Shopify Spy Product's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format. This makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

In conclusion, the Shopify Spy Product extension is a versatile tool, designed to cater to a wide range of needs. With its ability to extract and compile data quickly and efficiently, it is a must-have for anyone looking to stay ahead in the fast-paced world of e-commerce. Try Shopify Spy Product today and take your business to the next level!
long.fr:
Shopify Spy scrapes products from Shopify powered stores and saves as an Excel document or CSV file.

2024 Q3 changes:
- Download a single product
- Display some store metadata
- Better handling if errors

2024 Q2 changes:
- Highly requested feature: Downloading images.
- Slow mode: Extract more fields but slower: Variant Barcode, Image Alt Text, Variant Tax Code, Variant Weight Unit
- Old "Excel" format has been renamed to "Excel (Legacy)" and will be removed in further releases
- Option to manually specify a collection handle if the list of collections is too large.
- Enhanced error handling with clearer explanations

2024 Q1 changes:
- Resolved "Out of memory" error for large stores; now, CSV/Excel files are automatically split for efficient data handling.
- Improved status messages for enhanced clarity and precision.

2023 Q3-Q4 changes:
- Undock popup: you can use browser while the scraping is in progress and even scrape several store simultaneously
- Renewed login flow

Shopify Spy features:
✓ Can extract thousands of products within minutes
✓ Filter by a specific collection
✓ All fields from Shopify product listing are included (see below)
✓ All product images are added to the CSV
✓ Download images along with CSV
✓ Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Save as XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices
✓ Does not require excessive permissions

Why Shopify Spy:

For e-commerce store owners, Shopify Spy allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. With this tool, you can quickly and easily extract thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores and filter them by specific collections.

For digital marketers, Shopify Spy provides accurate and reliable product data to help you analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients.

For product researchers, Shopify Spy makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. This means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

For dropshippers, Shopify Spy is an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store, and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products.

For data analysts, Shopify Spy's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

So, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, Shopify Spy has everything you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try it out today and take your business to the next level!

Supported Fields:
- Handle: The unique identifier for the product.
- Title: The name of the product.
- Body (HTML): The HTML description of the product.
- Vendor: The name of the product's vendor.
- Product Type: The category or type of the product.
- Tags: Keywords associated with the product.
- Published: Indicates whether the product is published or unpublished.

Options:
- Option Name
- Option Value

Variants:
- Variant SKU: The stock keeping unit for the variant.
- Variant Grams: The weight of the variant in grams.
- Variant Price: The price of the variant.
- Variant Compare At Price: The original price of the variant, used for comparison.
- Variant Inventory Qty: Inventory quantity, where 0 indicates out of stock and 1 indicates in stock.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Variants:
- Variant Barcode: The barcode for the variant.
- Variant Tax Code: The tax code associated with the variant.
- Variant Weight Unit: The unit of weight measurement for the variant.

Images:
- Image Src: The source URL of the image.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Images:
- Image Alt Text: The alternative text for the image.

Shopify Spy extrait les produits des boutiques alimentées par Shopify et les enregistre en tant que document Excel ou fichier CSV.

Modifications au troisième trimestre 2023:
- Détacher la popup: vous pouvez utiliser le navigateur pendant que le scraping est en cours et même scraper plusieurs boutiques simultanément
- Flux de connexion renouvelé

Fonctionnalités de Shopify Spy:
✓ Peut extraire des milliers de produits en quelques minutes
✓ Filtrer par une collection spécifique
✓ Tous les champs de la liste de produits Shopify sont inclus (voir ci-dessous)
✓ Toutes les images de produits sont ajoutées au CSV
✓ Exporter au format CSV compatible avec le format d'importation Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/fr/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Enregistrer en tant que XLSX (document Excel) avec des types de données appropriés - dates, prix
✓ Ne nécessite pas d'autorisations excessives

Pourquoi Shopify Spy:

Pour les propriétaires de boutiques de commerce électronique, Shopify Spy vous permet de suivre les produits, les prix et les promotions de vos concurrents. Avec cet outil, vous pouvez rapidement et facilement extraire des milliers de produits des boutiques alimentées par Shopify et les filtrer par collections spécifiques.

Pour les marketeurs numériques, Shopify Spy fournit des données de produits précises et fiables pour vous aider à analyser les tendances du marché et à identifier les opportunités potentielles pour vos clients.

Pour les chercheurs de produits, Shopify Spy facilite la collecte de données sur un grand nombre de produits rapidement et efficacement. Cela signifie que vous pouvez identifier les tendances et les perspectives dans votre domaine de recherche avec facilité.

Pour les dropshippers, Shopify Spy est un outil essentiel pour trouver de nouveaux produits à ajouter à votre boutique et surveiller les prix et la disponibilité des produits pour vos produits existants.

Pour les analystes de données, la capacité de Shopify Spy à extraire des données de produits des boutiques Shopify et à les enregistrer au format CSV ou Excel en fait un outil attrayant pour traiter de grandes quantités de données rapidement et efficacement.

Ainsi, que vous soyez propriétaire d'une boutique de commerce électronique, marketeur numérique, chercheur de produits, dropshipper ou analyste de données, Shopify Spy a tout ce dont vous avez besoin pour rester au fait des dernières tendances et perspectives de produits. Essayez-le aujourd'hui et faites passer votre entreprise au niveau supérieur!

Champs pris en charge:
- Titre
- Poignée
- Description (en texte brut)
- Date et heure de création
- Date et heure de mise à jour
- Vendeur
- Type de produit
- Étiquettes
- Prix maximum
- Prix minimum
- 5 variantes de produits incluant le titre, le prix, le prix remisé et l'URL de l'image
- 10 images
- toutes les options

Shopify Spy શોપીફાય પવરેડ સ્ટોર્સ પ્રોડક્ટ્સને સ્ક્રેપ કરે છે અને તેને એક્સેલ દસ્તાવેજ અથવા CSV ફાઇલ તરીકે સાચવે છે.

2023 Q3 ફેરફારો:
- અન્ડોક પોપઅપ: તમે સ્ક્રેપિંગ ચાલુ છે ત્યારે બ્રાઉઝરનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો અને એકસાથે વિવિધ સ્ટોર સ્ક્રેપ પણ કરી શકો છો
- નવીનીકૃત લોગિન પ્રવાહ

Shopify Spy વૈશિષ્ટ્યો:
✓ મિનિટોમાં હજારો પ્રોડક્ટ્સ એક્સટ્રેક્ટ કરી શકે છે
✓ વિશેષ સંગ્રહણ દ્વારા ફિલ્ટર કરો
✓ શોપીફાય પ્રોડક્ટ લિસ્ટિંગમાંથી બધી ફીલ્ડ્સ શામેલ છે (નીચે જુઓ)
✓ બધી પ્રોડક્ટ છબીઓ CSVમાં ઉમેરવામાં આવી છે
✓ શોપીફાય આયાત ફોર્મેટથી સુસંગત CSV ફોર્મેટમાં નિકાસ કરો (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ યોગ્ય ડેટા પ્રકારો - તારીખો, ભાવો સાથે XLSX (Excel દસ્તાવેજ) તરીકે સાચવો
✓ અતિવ્યાપી પરવાનગીઓની જરૂર નથી

શોપીફાય સ્પાય શું છે:

ઈ-કોમર્સ સ્ટોર માલિકો માટે, Shopify Spy તમને તમારા સ્પર્ધકોના પ્રોડક્ટ્સ, ભાવનીં, અને પ્રોમોશન્સની ટ્રેક રાખવામાં મદદ કરે છે. આ ટૂલ સાથે, તમે ઝડપી અને સરળતાથી શોપીફાય-પવરેડ સ્ટોર્સમાંથી હજારો પ્રોડક્ટ્સ એક્સટ્રેક્ટ કરી શકો છો અને તેમને વિશેષ સંગ્રહણ દ્વારા ફિલ્ટર કરી શકો છે.

ડિજિટલ માર્કેટર્સ માટે, Shopify Spy તમારા ક્લાઇન્ટ્સ માટે સંભવ્ય તકો ઓળખવા માટે તમને બજાર ટ્રેન્ડ્સને વિશ્લેષણ કરવામાં મદદ કરવા માટે સાચી અને વિશ્વસનીય પ્રોડક્ટ ડેટા પ્રદાન કરે છે.

પ્રોડક્ટ રીસર્ચર્સ માટે, Shopify Spy તે બનાવે છે કે તમે ઝડપી અને કુશળતાથી મોટી સંખ્યામાં પ્રોડક્ટ્સ પર ડેટા એકત્ર કરવા માટે સરળ બનાવે છે. આ અર્થે તમે તમારા રીસર્ચ ક્ષેત્રમાં ટ્રેન્ડ્સ અને અંતર્દૃષ્ટિઓને સરળતાથી ઓળખી શકો છો.

ડ્રોપશિપર્સ માટે, Shopify Spy તમારા સ્ટોરમાં નવા પ્રોડક્ટ્સ ઉમેરવા અને તમારા હાલના પ્રોડક્ટ્સ માટે ભાવ અને પ્રોડક્ટ ઉપલબ્ધતા નિગહાણી કરવા માટે આવશ્યક ટૂલ છે.

ડેટા એનાલિસ્ટ્સ માટે, Shopify Spy ની ક્ષમતા શોપીફાય સ્ટોર્સમાંથી પ્રોડક્ટ ડેટા એક્સટ્રેક્ટ કરવા અને તેને CSV અથવા Excel ફોર્મેટમાં સાચવવા માટે તે મોટી માત્રામાં ડેટા ઝડપી અને કુશળતાથી પ્રસંસા પામેલી ટૂલ બની જાય છે.

તેથી, ચાહે તમે ઈ-કોમર્સ સ્ટોર માલિક, ડિજિટલ માર્કેટર, પ્રોડક્ટ રીસર્ચર, ડ્રોપશિપર, અથવા ડેટા એનાલિસ્ટ હોવ, Shopify Spy તમને નવીનતમ પ્રોડક્ટ ટ્રેન્ડ્સ અને અંતર્દૃષ્ટિઓ પર જત

שינויים ברבעון השלישי של 2023:
- פתיחת חלון צף: אתה יכול להשתמש בדפדפן בזמן שהסריקה מתבצעת ואפילו לסרוק מספר חנויות בו זמנית
- זרימת התחברות מחודשת

תכונות Shopify Spy:
✓ יכול לחלץ אלפי מוצרים תוך דקות
✓ מסננת לפי אוסף מסוים
✓ כל השדות מרשימת המוצרים של Shopify כלולים (ראה למטה)
✓ כל התמונות של המוצר מתווספות ל-CSV
✓ ייצוא לפורמט CSV תואם לפורמט ייבוא של Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ שמירה כ-XLSX (מסמך Excel) עם סוגי נתונים מתאימים - תאריכים, מחירים
✓ אינו דורש הרשאות יתר

למה Shopify Spy:

עבור בעלי חנויות מסחר אלקטרוני, Shopify Spy מאפשר לך לעקוב אחר מוצרים, מחירים ומבצעים של המתחרים שלך. עם כלי זה, אתה יכול לחלץ במהירות ובקלות אלפי מוצרים מחנויות שמופעלות על ידי Shopify ולסננם לפי אוספים מסוימים.

עבור שוקאים דיגיטליים, Shopify Spy מספק נתוני מוצר מדויקים ואמינים כדי לעזור לך לנתח מגמות שוק ולזהות הזדמנויות פוטנציאליות עבור הלקוחות שלך.

עבור מחקרי מוצרים, Shopify Spy מקל על איסוף נתונים על מספר גדול של מוצרים בצורה מהירה ויעילה. זה אומר שאתה יכול לזהות מגמות ותובנות בתחום המחקר שלך בקלות.

עבור dropshippers, Shopify Spy הוא כלי חיוני למציאת מוצרים חדשים להוספה לחנות שלך, ולניטור מחירים וזמינות מוצרים עבור המוצרים הקיימים שלך.

עבור מנתחי נתונים, היכולת של Shopify Spy לחלץ נתוני מוצר מחנויות Shopify ולשמור אותם בפורמט CSV או Excel הופכת אותו לכלי מושך לעיבוד כמויות גדולות של נתונים בצורה מהירה ויעילה.

אז, בין אם אתה בעל חנות מסחר אלקטרוני, שוקאי דיגיטלי, מחקר מוצרים, dropshipper, או מנתח נתונים, Shopify Spy יש הכל כדי שתשאר מעודכן במגמות המוצר האחרונות והתובנות. נסה אותו היום והעלה את העסק שלך לרמה הבאה!

שדות נתמכים:
- כותרת
- מקט
- תיאור (בטקסט רגיל)
- תאריך ושעת יצירה
- תאריך ושעת עדכון
- ספק
- סוג מוצר
- תגיות
- מחיר מקסימלי
- מחיר מינימלי
- 5 גרסאות מוצר כולל כותרת, מחיר, מחיר הנחה, וכתובת URL של התמונה
- 10 תמונות
- כל האפשרויות
long.hi:
Shopify Spy scrapes products from Shopify powered stores and saves as an Excel document or CSV file.

2024 Q3 changes:
- Download a single product
- Display some store metadata
- Better handling if errors

2024 Q2 changes:
- Highly requested feature: Downloading images.
- Slow mode: Extract more fields but slower: Variant Barcode, Image Alt Text, Variant Tax Code, Variant Weight Unit
- Old "Excel" format has been renamed to "Excel (Legacy)" and will be removed in further releases
- Option to manually specify a collection handle if the list of collections is too large.
- Enhanced error handling with clearer explanations

2024 Q1 changes:
- Resolved "Out of memory" error for large stores; now, CSV/Excel files are automatically split for efficient data handling.
- Improved status messages for enhanced clarity and precision.

2023 Q3-Q4 changes:
- Undock popup: you can use browser while the scraping is in progress and even scrape several store simultaneously
- Renewed login flow

Shopify Spy features:
✓ Can extract thousands of products within minutes
✓ Filter by a specific collection
✓ All fields from Shopify product listing are included (see below)
✓ All product images are added to the CSV
✓ Download images along with CSV
✓ Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Save as XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices
✓ Does not require excessive permissions

Why Shopify Spy:

For e-commerce store owners, Shopify Spy allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. With this tool, you can quickly and easily extract thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores and filter them by specific collections.

For digital marketers, Shopify Spy provides accurate and reliable product data to help you analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients.

For product researchers, Shopify Spy makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. This means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

For dropshippers, Shopify Spy is an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store, and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products.

For data analysts, Shopify Spy's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

So, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, Shopify Spy has everything you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try it out today and take your business to the next level!

Supported Fields:
- Handle: The unique identifier for the product.
- Title: The name of the product.
- Body (HTML): The HTML description of the product.
- Vendor: The name of the product's vendor.
- Product Type: The category or type of the product.
- Tags: Keywords associated with the product.
- Published: Indicates whether the product is published or unpublished.

Options:
- Option Name
- Option Value

Variants:
- Variant SKU: The stock keeping unit for the variant.
- Variant Grams: The weight of the variant in grams.
- Variant Price: The price of the variant.
- Variant Compare At Price: The original price of the variant, used for comparison.
- Variant Inventory Qty: Inventory quantity, where 0 indicates out of stock and 1 indicates in stock.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Variants:
- Variant Barcode: The barcode for the variant.
- Variant Tax Code: The tax code associated with the variant.
- Variant Weight Unit: The unit of weight measurement for the variant.

Images:
- Image Src: The source URL of the image.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Images:
- Image Alt Text: The alternative text for the image.

Shopify Spy स्क्रेप Shopify संचालित स्टोरों से उत्पादों को और इसे एक एक्सेल दस्तावेज़ या CSV फ़ाइल के रूप में सहेजता है। 

2023 Q3 परिवर्तन:
- अंडॉक पॉपअप: स्क्रेपिंग प्रगति में होते समय आप ब्राउज़र का उपयोग कर सकते हैं और साथ ही साथ कई स्टोरों को एक साथ स्क्रेप कर सकते हैं
- नवीनीकृत लॉगिन प्रवाह

Shopify Spy की विशेषताएं:
✓ मिनटों के भीतर हजारों उत्पादों को निकाल सकते हैं
✓ विशेष संग्रहालय द्वारा फ़िल्टर करें
✓ Shopify उत्पाद सूची से सभी फ़ील्ड शामिल हैं (नीचे देखें)
✓ सभी उत्पाद छवियाँ CSV में जोड़ी जाती हैं
✓ Shopify आयात स्वरूप के साथ संगत CSV स्वरूप में निर्यात करें (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ सही डेटा प्रकारों के साथ XLSX (एक्सेल दस्तावेज़) के रूप में सहेजें - तिथियाँ, मूल्य
✓ अत्यधिक अनुमतियाँ की आवश्यकता नहीं होती है

Shopify Spy क्यों:

ई-कॉमर्स स्टोर के मालिकों के लिए, Shopify Spy आपको अपने प्रतिस्पर्धियों के उत्पादों, मूल्य निर्धारण, और प्रचारों का ध्यान रखने की अनुमति देता है। इस उपकरण के साथ, आप Shopify-संचालित स्टोरों से हजारों उत्पादों को तेजी से और आसानी से निकाल सकते हैं और उन्हें विशेष संग्रहालयों द्वारा फ़िल्टर कर सकते हैं। 

डिजिटल मार्केटरों के लिए, Shopify Spy आपको बाजार की प्रवृत्तियों का विश्लेषण करने और अपने ग्राहकों के लिए संभावित अवसरों की पहचान करने में मदद करने के लिए सटीक और विश्वसनीय उत्पाद डेटा प्रदान करता है। 

उत्पाद शोधकर्ताओं के लिए, Shopify Spy बड़ी संख्या में उत्पादों के डेटा को तेजी से और कुशलतापूर्वक एकत्र करना आसान बनाता है। इसका अर्थ है कि आप अपने शोध क्षेत्र में प्रवृत्तियों और अंतर्दृष्टियों की पहचान कर सकते हैं। 

ड्रॉपशिपर्स के लिए, Shopify Spy अपने स्टोर में नए उत्पादों को जोड़ने के लिए एक महत्वपूर्ण उपकरण है, और अपने मौजूदा उत्पादों के लिए मूल्य और उत्पाद उपलब्धता की मॉनिटरिंग करता है। 

डेटा विश्लेषकों के लिए, Shopify Spy की योग्यता Shopify स्टोरों से उत्पाद डेटा को निकालने और इसे CSV या एक्सेल स्वरूप में सहेजने की, बड़ी मात्रा में डेटा को तेजी से और कुशलतापूर्वक संसाधित करने के लिए एक आकर्षक उपकरण बनाती है। 

इसलिए, चाहे आप ई-कॉमर्स स्टोर के मालिक, डिजिटल मार्केटर, उत्पाद शोधकर्ता, ड्रॉपशिपर, या डेटा विश्लेषक हों, Shopify Spy में आपको नवीनतम उत्पाद प्रवृत्तियों और अंतर्दृष्टियों पर बने रहने के लिए सब कुछ मिलता है। आज ही इसे आजमाएं और अपने व्यापार को अगले स्तर पर ले जाएं!

समर्थित फ़ील्ड:
- शीर्षक
- हैंडल
- विवरण (सादे पाठ में)
- निर्मित तिथि और समय
- अद्यतित तिथि और समय
- विक्रेता
- उत्पाद प्रकार
- टैग्स
- अधिकतम मूल्य
- न्यूनतम मूल्य
- शीर्षक, मूल्य, छूट वाले मूल्य, और छवि URL सहित 5 उत्पाद वेरिएंट
- 10 छवियाँ
- सभी विकल्प
