Shopify Spy skida proizvode s trgovina koje koriste Shopify i sprema ih kao Excel dokument ili CSV datoteku.

Promjene za 2023. Q3:
- Odvojeni prozor: možete koristiti preglednik dok je skidanje u tijeku, pa čak i skidati s više trgovina istovremeno
- Obnovljeni postupak prijave

Značajke Shopify Spya:
✓ Može izvući tisuće proizvoda u roku od nekoliko minuta
✓ Filtriranje prema određenoj kolekciji
✓ Uključena su sva polja s popisa proizvoda na Shopifyu (vidi dolje)
✓ Sve slike proizvoda dodane su u CSV
✓ Izvoz u CSV format kompatibilan s formatom za uvoz na Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Spremi kao XLSX (Excel dokument) s ispravnim vrstama podataka - datumi, cijene
✓ Ne zahtijeva pretjerane dozvole

Zašto Shopify Spy:

Za vlasnike e-trgovina, Shopify Spy omogućuje vam praćenje proizvoda, cijena i promocija vaših konkurenata. S ovim alatom, možete brzo i jednostavno izvući tisuće proizvoda iz trgovina koje koriste Shopify i filtrirati ih prema određenim kolekcijama.

Za digitalne marketinške stručnjake, Shopify Spy pruža precizne i pouzdane podatke o proizvodima kako biste mogli analizirati trendove na tržištu i identificirati potencijalne prilike za vaše klijente.

Za istraživače proizvoda, Shopify Spy olakšava prikupljanje podataka o velikom broju proizvoda brzo i učinkovito. To znači da možete lako identificirati trendove i uvide u svom području istraživanja.

Za dropshippere, Shopify Spy je neophodan alat za pronalaženje novih proizvoda koje možete dodati u svoju trgovinu, te za praćenje cijena i dostupnosti proizvoda.

Za analitičare podataka, sposobnost Shopify Spya da izvuče podatke o proizvodima iz trgovina na Shopifyu i spremi ih u CSV ili Excel format čini ga privlačnim alatom za brzu i učinkovitu obradu velikih količina podataka.

Dakle, bilo da ste vlasnik e-trgovine, digitalni marketinški stručnjak, istraživač proizvoda, dropshipper ili analitičar podataka, Shopify Spy ima sve što vam je potrebno da biste bili u tijeku s najnovijim trendovima i uvidima u proizvode. Isprobajte ga danas i podignite svoje poslovanje na višu razinu!

Podržana polja:
- Naslov
- Ručka
- Opis (u obliku čistog teksta)
- Datum i vrijeme stvaranja
- Datum i vrijeme ažuriranja
- Prodavatelj
- Vrsta proizvoda
- Oznake
- Najviša cijena
- Najniža cijena
- 5 varijanti proizvoda uključujući naslov, cijenu, cijenu s popustom i URL slike
- 10 slika
- sve opcije

A Shopify Spy lekaparja a termékeket a Shopify által üzemeltetett üzletekből és elmenti azokat Excel dokumentumként vagy CSV fájlként.

2023 Q3 változások:
- Leválasztható felugró ablak: böngészhet a kaparás folyamán, sőt több üzletet is egyszerre kaparhat
- Megújult bejelentkezési folyamat

Shopify Spy jellemzők:
✓ Pillanatok alatt képes több ezer terméket kinyerni
✓ Szűrés egy adott gyűjtemény szerint
✓ A Shopify terméklistából minden mezőt tartalmazza (lásd alább)
✓ Az összes termékképet hozzáadja a CSV-hez
✓ Exportálás CSV formátumban, amely kompatibilis a Shopify import formátumával (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Mentés XLSX (Excel dokumentum) formátumban megfelelő adattípusokkal - dátumok, árak
✓ Nem igényel túlzott engedélyeket

Miért a Shopify Spy:

Az e-kereskedelmi üzlet tulajdonosoknak a Shopify Spy lehetővé teszi, hogy nyomon kövessék versenytársaik termékeit, árazását és promócióit. Ezzel az eszközzel gyorsan és könnyen kinyerhet több ezer terméket a Shopify által működtetett üzletekből és szűrheti őket egy adott gyűjtemény szerint.

A digitális marketingszakembereknek a Shopify Spy pontos és megbízható termékadatokat biztosít, amelyek segítenek a piaci trendek elemzésében és a potenciális lehetőségek azonosításában az ügyfelek számára.

A termékkutatóknak a Shopify Spy egyszerűvé teszi a nagy mennyiségű termék adatainak gyors és hatékony összegyűjtését. Ez azt jelenti, hogy könnyedén azonosíthatja a trendeket és betekintéseket a kutatási területén.

A dropshipper-ek számára a Shopify Spy elengedhetetlen eszköz új termékek megtalálásához, amelyeket hozzáadhatnak az üzletükhöz, és figyelemmel kísérhetik az árazást és a termékek elérhetőségét a meglévő termékeik számára.

Az adatelemzők számára a Shopify Spy képessége, hogy kinyerje a termékadatokat a Shopify üzletekből és elmentse azokat CSV vagy Excel formátumban, vonzó eszközzé teszi a nagy mennyiségű adat gyors és hatékony feldolgozásához.

Tehát, akár e-kereskedelmi üzlet tulajdonosa, digitális marketingszakember, termékkutató, dropshipper vagy adatelemző vagy, a Shopify Spy mindent tartalmaz, amire szüksége lehet a legfrissebb terméktrendek és betekintések nyomon követéséhez. Próbálja ki ma és emelje üzletét a következő szintre!

Shopify Spy scrapes products from Shopify powered stores and saves as an Excel document or CSV file.

2024 Q3 changes:
- Download a single product
- Display some store metadata
- Better handling if errors

2024 Q2 changes:
- Highly requested feature: Downloading images.
- Slow mode: Extract more fields but slower: Variant Barcode, Image Alt Text, Variant Tax Code, Variant Weight Unit
- Old "Excel" format has been renamed to "Excel (Legacy)" and will be removed in further releases
- Option to manually specify a collection handle if the list of collections is too large.
- Enhanced error handling with clearer explanations

2024 Q1 changes:
- Resolved "Out of memory" error for large stores; now, CSV/Excel files are automatically split for efficient data handling.
- Improved status messages for enhanced clarity and precision.

2023 Q3-Q4 changes:
- Undock popup: you can use browser while the scraping is in progress and even scrape several store simultaneously
- Renewed login flow

Shopify Spy features:
✓ Can extract thousands of products within minutes
✓ Filter by a specific collection
✓ All fields from Shopify product listing are included (see below)
✓ All product images are added to the CSV
✓ Download images along with CSV
✓ Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Save as XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices
✓ Does not require excessive permissions

Why Shopify Spy:

For e-commerce store owners, Shopify Spy allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. With this tool, you can quickly and easily extract thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores and filter them by specific collections.

For digital marketers, Shopify Spy provides accurate and reliable product data to help you analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients.

For product researchers, Shopify Spy makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. This means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

For dropshippers, Shopify Spy is an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store, and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products.

For data analysts, Shopify Spy's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

So, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, Shopify Spy has everything you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try it out today and take your business to the next level!

Supported Fields:
- Handle: The unique identifier for the product.
- Title: The name of the product.
- Body (HTML): The HTML description of the product.
- Vendor: The name of the product's vendor.
- Product Type: The category or type of the product.
- Tags: Keywords associated with the product.
- Published: Indicates whether the product is published or unpublished.

Options:
- Option Name
- Option Value

Variants:
- Variant SKU: The stock keeping unit for the variant.
- Variant Grams: The weight of the variant in grams.
- Variant Price: The price of the variant.
- Variant Compare At Price: The original price of the variant, used for comparison.
- Variant Inventory Qty: Inventory quantity, where 0 indicates out of stock and 1 indicates in stock.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Variants:
- Variant Barcode: The barcode for the variant.
- Variant Tax Code: The tax code associated with the variant.
- Variant Weight Unit: The unit of weight measurement for the variant.

Images:
- Image Src: The source URL of the image.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Images:
- Image Alt Text: The alternative text for the image.

Shopify Spy mengambil produk dari toko yang didukung Shopify dan menyimpannya sebagai dokumen Excel atau file CSV.

Perubahan Q3 2023:
- Lepaskan popup: Anda dapat menggunakan browser saat proses scraping sedang berlangsung dan bahkan dapat melakukan scraping beberapa toko secara bersamaan
- Alur login yang diperbarui

Fitur Shopify Spy:
✓ Dapat mengekstrak ribuan produk dalam hitungan menit
✓ Filter berdasarkan koleksi tertentu
✓ Semua bidang dari daftar produk Shopify disertakan (lihat di bawah)
✓ Semua gambar produk ditambahkan ke CSV
✓ Ekspor ke format CSV yang kompatibel dengan format impor Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Simpan sebagai XLSX (dokumen Excel) dengan jenis data yang tepat - tanggal, harga
✓ Tidak memerlukan izin berlebihan

Mengapa Shopify Spy:

Bagi pemilik toko e-commerce, Shopify Spy memungkinkan Anda untuk melacak produk, harga, dan promosi pesaing Anda. Dengan alat ini, Anda dapat dengan cepat dan mudah mengekstrak ribuan produk dari toko yang didukung Shopify dan memfilternya berdasarkan koleksi tertentu.

Bagi pemasar digital, Shopify Spy menyediakan data produk yang akurat dan dapat diandalkan untuk membantu Anda menganalisis tren pasar dan mengidentifikasi peluang potensial untuk klien Anda.

Bagi peneliti produk, Shopify Spy memudahkan pengumpulan data pada sejumlah besar produk dengan cepat dan efisien. Ini berarti Anda dapat mengidentifikasi tren dan wawasan di bidang penelitian Anda dengan mudah.

Bagi dropshipper, Shopify Spy adalah alat penting untuk menemukan produk baru untuk ditambahkan ke toko Anda, dan memantau harga dan ketersediaan produk yang ada.

Bagi analis data, kemampuan Shopify Spy untuk mengekstrak data produk dari toko Shopify dan menyimpannya dalam format CSV atau Excel membuatnya menjadi alat yang menarik untuk memproses sejumlah besar data dengan cepat dan efisien.

Jadi, apakah Anda pemilik toko e-commerce, pemasar digital, peneliti produk, dropshipper, atau analis data, Shopify Spy memiliki segala yang Anda butuhkan untuk tetap mengikuti tren dan wawasan produk terbaru. Coba sekarang dan bawa bisnis Anda ke level berikutnya!

Bidang yang didukung:
- Judul
- Handle
- Deskripsi (dalam teks biasa)
- Tanggal dan waktu dibuat
- Tanggal dan waktu diperbarui
- Vendor
- Jenis Produk
- Tag
- Harga maksimal
- Harga minimal
- 5 varian produk termasuk judul, harga, harga diskon, dan URL gambar
- 10 gambar
- semua opsi

Shopify Spy rastrella i prodotti dai negozi alimentati da Shopify e li salva come documento Excel o file CSV.

Modifiche del terzo trimestre 2023:

- Flusso di accesso rinnovato

Caratteristiche di Shopify Spy:
✓ Può estrarre migliaia di prodotti in pochi minuti
✓ Filtra per una specifica collezione
✓ Sono inclusi tutti i campi dell'elenco dei prodotti Shopify (vedi sotto)
✓ Tutte le immagini dei prodotti vengono aggiunte al CSV
✓ Esporta in formato CSV compatibile con il formato di importazione Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Salva come XLSX (documento Excel) con i tipi di dati corretti - date, prezzi
✓ Non richiede permessi eccessivi

Perché Shopify Spy:

Per i proprietari di negozi di e-commerce, Shopify Spy ti consente di tenere traccia dei prodotti, dei prezzi e delle promozioni dei tuoi concorrenti. Con questo strumento, puoi estrarre rapidamente e facilmente migliaia di prodotti dai negozi alimentati da Shopify e filtrarli per collezioni specifiche.

Per i marketer digitali, Shopify Spy fornisce dati sui prodotti accurati e affidabili per aiutarti a analizzare le tendenze del mercato e identificare potenziali opportunità per i tuoi clienti.

Per i ricercatori di prodotti, Shopify Spy rende facile raccogliere dati su un gran numero di prodotti in modo rapido ed efficiente. Ciò significa che puoi identificare tendenze e intuizioni nel tuo campo di ricerca con facilità.

Per i dropshipper, Shopify Spy è uno strumento essenziale per trovare nuovi prodotti da aggiungere al tuo negozio e monitorare i prezzi e la disponibilità dei prodotti esistenti.

Per gli analisti di dati, la capacità di Shopify Spy di estrarre dati sui prodotti dai negozi Shopify e salvarli in un formato CSV o Excel lo rende uno strumento attraente per elaborare grandi quantità di dati in modo rapido ed efficiente.

Quindi, che tu sia un proprietario di negozio di e-commerce, un marketer digitale, un ricercatore di prodotti, un dropshipper o un analista di dati, Shopify Spy ha tutto ciò di cui hai bisogno per rimanere aggiornato sulle ultime tendenze e intuizioni dei prodotti. Provalo oggi e porta la tua attività al livello successivo!

- Prezzo minimo

Shopify Spyは、Shopifyで運営されているストアから商品をスクレイピングし、Excel文書またはCSVファイルとして保存します。

2023年第3四半期の変更点：
- ポップアップをアンドック：スクレイピングが進行中でもブラウザを使用したり、同時に複数のストアをスクレイピングしたりすることができます
- ログインフローの更新

Shopify Spyの特長：
✓ 数分で数千の商品を抽出可能
✓ 特定のコレクションによるフィルタリング
✓ Shopifyの商品リストからすべてのフィールドが含まれています（下記参照）
✓ すべての商品画像がCSVに追加されます
✓ Shopifyのインポート形式と互換性のあるCSV形式へのエクスポート（https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products）
✓ 適切なデータタイプ（日付、価格）でXLSX（Excel文書）として保存
✓ 過度な権限は必要ありません

Shopify Spyを選ぶ理由：

eコマースストアのオーナーにとって、Shopify Spyは競合他社の商品、価格、プロモーションを追跡することができます。このツールを使用すれば、Shopifyで運営されているストアから数千の商品を素早く簡単に抽出し、特定のコレクションによってフィルタリングすることができます。

デジタルマーケターにとって、Shopify Spyは正確で信頼性の高い商品データを提供し、市場のトレンドを分析し、クライアントの潜在的な機会を特定するのに役立ちます。

商品リサーチャーにとって、Shopify Spyは大量の商品データを素早く効率的に収集するのに便利です。これにより、あなたの研究分野でのトレンドや洞察を簡単に特定することができます。

ドロップシッパーにとって、Shopify Spyはストアに追加する新商品を見つけ、既存商品の価格と在庫状況を監視するための必須ツールです。

データアナリストにとって、Shopify SpyはShopifyストアから商品データを抽出し、CSVまたはExcel形式で保存する能力を持っているため、大量のデータを素早く効率的に処理するツールとして魅力的です。

ですから、あなたがeコマースストアのオーナー、デジタルマーケター、商品リサーチャー、ドロップシッパー、またはデータアナリストであれば、Shopify Spyは最新の商品トレンドと洞察を把握するために必要なすべてを提供します。今日試してみて、ビジネスを次のレベルに引き上げましょう！

対応フィールド：
- タイトル
- ハンドル
- 説明（プレーンテキスト）
- 作成日時
- 更新日時
- ベンダー
- 商品タイプ
- タグ
- 最高価格
- 最低価格
- タイトル、価格、割引価格、画像URLを含む5つの商品バリエーション
- 10枚の画像
- 全てのオプション

2023 Q3 ಬದಲಾವಣೆಗಳು:
- ಅಂಡಾಕ್ ಪಾಪ್-ಅಪ್: ಸ್ಕ್ರೇಪಿಂಗ್ ನಡೆಯುತ್ತಿರುವಾಗ ನೀವು ಬ್ರೌಸರ್ ಅನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬಹುದು ಮತ್ತು ಏಕಕಾಲದಲ್ಲಿ ಹಲವಾರು ಅಂಗಡಿಗಳನ್ನು ಸ್ಕ್ರೇಪ್ ಮಾಡಬಹುದು

Introducing "Shopify Spy ShopifyHunt" - your one-stop solution for scraping product data from Shopify-powered stores and compiling it into an Excel document or CSV file. This versatile Chrome extension is a game-changer for e-commerce store owners, digital marketers, product researchers, dropshippers, and data analysts. With ShopifyHunt, you can stay ahead of the curve by monitoring your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions.

What's New in ShopifyHunt 2023 Q3:
- Undock popup: This innovative feature allows you to use your browser while the scraping is in progress. You can even scrape several stores simultaneously!
- Renewed login flow: We've enhanced our login process to provide a smoother, more user-friendly experience.

Key Features of ShopifyHunt:
✓ Rapid Product Extraction: ShopifyHunt can extract thousands of products within minutes, saving you time and effort.
✓ Collection Filter: Filter by a specific collection to hone in on the products you're most interested in.
✓ Comprehensive Data Fields: ShopifyHunt includes all fields from the Shopify product listing. From title to tags to pricing - we've got you covered.
✓ Product Images: All product images are added to the CSV, providing a complete picture of each product.
✓ Compatible Export Formats: ShopifyHunt exports data in CSV format, compatible with Shopify import format, and as an XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices.

Why Choose ShopifyHunt?
For e-commerce store owners, ShopifyHunt offers a powerful way to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. This tool allows you to extract thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores and filter them by specific collections.

Digital marketers will find ShopifyHunt an invaluable asset for providing accurate and reliable product data to analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for clients.

For product researchers, ShopifyHunt's ability to quickly and efficiently gather data on a large number of products means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

Dropshippers will find ShopifyHunt essential for finding new products to add to your store, and monitoring pricing and product availability for existing products.

Data analysts will appreciate ShopifyHunt's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format, making it a powerful tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

Supported Fields in ShopifyHunt:
- Title, Handle, Description (in plain text)
- Created date and time, Updated date and time
- Vendor, Product Type, Tags
- Max price, Min price
- 5 product variants including title, price, discount price, and image URL
- 10 images, all options

Whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, Shopify Spy ShopifyHunt is the tool you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try ShopifyHunt today and take your business to the next level!

Shopify Spy scrapes products from Shopify powered stores and saves as an Excel document or CSV file.

2024 Q3 changes:
- Download a single product
- Display some store metadata
- Better handling if errors

2024 Q2 changes:
- Highly requested feature: Downloading images.
- Slow mode: Extract more fields but slower: Variant Barcode, Image Alt Text, Variant Tax Code, Variant Weight Unit
- Old "Excel" format has been renamed to "Excel (Legacy)" and will be removed in further releases
- Option to manually specify a collection handle if the list of collections is too large.
- Enhanced error handling with clearer explanations

2024 Q1 changes:
- Resolved "Out of memory" error for large stores; now, CSV/Excel files are automatically split for efficient data handling.
- Improved status messages for enhanced clarity and precision.

2023 Q3-Q4 changes:
- Undock popup: you can use browser while the scraping is in progress and even scrape several store simultaneously
- Renewed login flow

Shopify Spy features:
✓ Can extract thousands of products within minutes
✓ Filter by a specific collection
✓ All fields from Shopify product listing are included (see below)
✓ All product images are added to the CSV
✓ Download images along with CSV
✓ Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Save as XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices
✓ Does not require excessive permissions

Why Shopify Spy:

For e-commerce store owners, Shopify Spy allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. With this tool, you can quickly and easily extract thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores and filter them by specific collections.

For digital marketers, Shopify Spy provides accurate and reliable product data to help you analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients.

For product researchers, Shopify Spy makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. This means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

For dropshippers, Shopify Spy is an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store, and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products.

For data analysts, Shopify Spy's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

So, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, Shopify Spy has everything you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try it out today and take your business to the next level!

Supported Fields:
- Handle: The unique identifier for the product.
- Title: The name of the product.
- Body (HTML): The HTML description of the product.
- Vendor: The name of the product's vendor.
- Product Type: The category or type of the product.
- Tags: Keywords associated with the product.
- Published: Indicates whether the product is published or unpublished.

Options:
- Option Name
- Option Value

Variants:
- Variant SKU: The stock keeping unit for the variant.
- Variant Grams: The weight of the variant in grams.
- Variant Price: The price of the variant.
- Variant Compare At Price: The original price of the variant, used for comparison.
- Variant Inventory Qty: Inventory quantity, where 0 indicates out of stock and 1 indicates in stock.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Variants:
- Variant Barcode: The barcode for the variant.
- Variant Tax Code: The tax code associated with the variant.
- Variant Weight Unit: The unit of weight measurement for the variant.

Images:
- Image Src: The source URL of the image.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Images:
- Image Alt Text: The alternative text for the image.

Shopify Spy는 Shopify로 운영되는 상점에서 제품을 스크랩하고 Excel 문서 또는 CSV 파일로 저장합니다.

2023년 3분기 변경 사항:
- 도킹 해제 팝업: 스크래핑이 진행되는 동안 브라우저를 사용하고 여러 상점을 동시에 스크랩할 수 있습니다.
- 갱신된 로그인 플로우

Shopify Spy 기능:
✓ 수천 개의 제품을 분 이내에 추출할 수 있습니다
✓ 특정 컬렉션으로 필터링할 수 있습니다
✓ Shopify 제품 목록의 모든 필드가 포함되어 있습니다 (아래 참조)
✓ 모든 제품 이미지가 CSV에 추가됩니다
✓ Shopify import 형식과 호환되는 CSV 형식으로 내보내기 (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ 적절한 데이터 유형 - 날짜, 가격과 함께 XLSX (Excel 문서)로 저장합니다
✓ 과도한 권한을 필요로 하지 않습니다

Shopify Spy의 이유:

전자 상거래 상점 소유자를 위해, Shopify Spy는 경쟁자의 제품, 가격, 프로모션을 추적할 수 있습니다. 이 도구를 사용하면, Shopify로 운영되는 상점에서 수천 개의 제품을 빠르고 쉽게 추출하고 특정 컬렉션으로 필터링 할 수 있습니다.

디지털 마케터를 위해, Shopify Spy는 시장 트렌드를 분석하고 고객을 위한 잠재적 기회를 식별하는 데 도움이되는 정확하고 신뢰할 수 있는 제품 데이터를 제공합니다.

제품 연구원을 위해, Shopify Spy는 대량의 제품 데이터를 빠르고 효율적으로 수집하는 것을 쉽게 만듭니다. 이는 연구 분야에서 트렌드와 인사이트를 쉽게 식별할 수 있음을 의미합니다.

드랍쉬퍼를 위해, Shopify Spy는 새로운 제품을 찾아 상점에 추가하고 기존 제품의 가격과 제품 가용성을 모니터링하는 데 필수 도구입니다.

데이터 분석가를 위해, Shopify Spy는 Shopify 상점에서 제품 데이터를 추출하고 CSV 또는 Excel 형식으로 저장하는 기능은 대량의 데이터를 빠르고 효율적으로 처리하는 데 매력적인 도구입니다.

따라서, 전자 상거래 상점 소유자, 디지털 마케터, 제품 연구원, 드랍쉬퍼, 또는 데이터 분석가이든, Shopify Spy는 최신 제품 트렌드와 인사이트를 파악하는 데 필요한 모든 것을 갖추고 있습니다. 지금 바로 시도하고 비즈니스를 다음 단계로 끌어올리세요!

지원되는 필드:
- 제목
- 핸들
- 설명 (일반 텍스트로)
- 생성 날짜 및 시간
- 업데이트 날짜 및 시간
- 공급업체
- 제품 유형
- 태그
- 최대 가격
- 최소 가격
- 제목, 가격, 할인 가격, 이미지 URL을 포함한 5개의 제품 변형
- 10개의 이미지
- 모든 옵션

Shopify Spy išgauna produktus iš Shopify palaikomų parduotuvių ir išsaugo kaip Excel dokumentą arba CSV failą.

2023 m. trečiojo ketvirčio pokyčiai:
- Išimti iškylančiąją langą: galite naudoti naršyklę, kai vyksta duomenų gavimas, ir netgi gauti duomenis iš kelių parduotuvių tuo pačiu metu
- Atnaujintas prisijungimo srautas

Shopify Spy funkcijos:
✓ Gali išgauti tūkstančius produktų per kelias minutes
✓ Filtras pagal konkretų rinkinį
✓ Įtraukti visi laukai iš Shopify produkto sąrašo (žr. žemiau)
✓ Visos produkto nuotraukos pridedamos prie CSV
✓ Eksportuoti į CSV formatą, suderinamą su Shopify importo formatu (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Išsaugoti kaip XLSX (Excel dokumentą) su tinkamais duomenų tipais - datos, kainos
✓ Nereikalauja pernelyg daug leidimų

Kodėl Shopify Spy:

Elektroninės prekybos parduotuvių savininkams, Shopify Spy leidžia stebėti konkurentų produktus, kainodarą ir akcijas. Su šiuo įrankiu galite greitai ir lengvai išgauti tūkstančius produktų iš Shopify palaikomų parduotuvių ir filtruoti juos pagal konkretų rinkinį.

Skaitmeniniams rinkodaros specialistams, Shopify Spy pateikia tikslus ir patikimus produktų duomenis, padedančius analizuoti rinkos tendencijas ir identifikuoti galimas galimybes jūsų klientams.

Produktų tyrėjams, Shopify Spy palengvina duomenų apie didelį produktų skaičių rinkimą greitai ir efektyviai. Tai reiškia, kad galite lengvai identifikuoti tendencijas ir įžvalgas savo tyrimų srityje.

Dropshipperiams, Shopify Spy yra būtinas įrankis, ieškant naujų produktų, kuriuos galima pridėti prie jūsų parduotuvės, ir stebint kainodarą bei produktų prieinamumą jūsų esamiems produktams.

Duomenų analitikams, Shopify Spy galimybė išgauti produktų duomenis iš Shopify parduotuvių ir išsaugoti juos CSV arba Excel formatu daro jį patraukliu įrankiu dideliems duomenų kiekiams greitai ir efektyviai apdoroti.

Taigi, ar esate elektroninės prekybos parduotuvės savininkas, skaitmeninio marketingo specialistas, produktų tyrėjas, dropshipperis ar duomenų analitikas, Shopify Spy turi viską, ko jums reikia, kad būtumėte informuoti apie naujausias produktų tendencijas ir įžvalgas. Išbandykite jį jau šiandien ir pakelkite savo verslą į kitą lygį!

- 10 nuotraukų
- visos parinktys

- Old "Excel" format has been renamed to "Excel (Legacy)" and will be removed in further releases
- Option to manually specify a collection handle if the list of collections is too large.
- Enhanced error handling with clearer explanations

2024 Q1 changes:
- Resolved "Out of memory" error for large stores; now, CSV/Excel files are automatically split for efficient data handling.
- Improved status messages for enhanced clarity and precision.

2023 Q3-Q4 changes:
- Undock popup: you can use browser while the scraping is in progress and even scrape several store simultaneously
- Renewed login flow

Shopify Spy features:
✓ Can extract thousands of products within minutes
✓ Filter by a specific collection
✓ All fields from Shopify product listing are included (see below)
✓ All product images are added to the CSV
✓ Download images along with CSV
✓ Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Save as XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices
✓ Does not require excessive permissions

Why Shopify Spy:

For e-commerce store owners, Shopify Spy allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. With this tool, you can quickly and easily extract thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores and filter them by specific collections.

For digital marketers, Shopify Spy provides accurate and reliable product data to help you analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients.

For product researchers, Shopify Spy makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. This means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

For dropshippers, Shopify Spy is an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store, and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products.

For data analysts, Shopify Spy's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

So, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, Shopify Spy has everything you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try it out today and take your business to the next level!

Supported Fields:
- Handle: The unique identifier for the product.
- Title: The name of the product.
- Body (HTML): The HTML description of the product.
- Vendor: The name of the product's vendor.
- Product Type: The category or type of the product.
- Tags: Keywords associated with the product.
- Published: Indicates whether the product is published or unpublished.

Options:
- Option Name
- Option Value

Variants:
- Variant SKU: The stock keeping unit for the variant.
- Variant Grams: The weight of the variant in grams.
- Variant Price: The price of the variant.
- Variant Compare At Price: The original price of the variant, used for comparison.
- Variant Inventory Qty: Inventory quantity, where 0 indicates out of stock and 1 indicates in stock.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Variants:
- Variant Barcode: The barcode for the variant.
- Variant Tax Code: The tax code associated with the variant.
- Variant Weight Unit: The unit of weight measurement for the variant.

Images:
- Image Src: The source URL of the image.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Images:
- Image Alt Text: The alternative text for the image.

Shopify Spy izvelk produktus no Shopify veikaliem un saglabā tos kā Excel dokumentu vai CSV failu.

2023. gada 3. ceturkšņa izmaiņas:
- Izdalošs uznirstošais logs: jūs varat izmantot pārlūku, kamēr notiek datu izvilkšana, un pat vienlaicīgi izvilkt datus no vairākiem veikaliem
- Atjaunota pieteikšanās procedūra

Shopify Spy iespējas:
✓ Var izvilkt tūkstošiem produktu dažu minūšu laikā
✓ Filtrēt pēc konkrētas kolekcijas
✓ Iekļauti visi lauki no Shopify produkta apraksta (skatīt zemāk)
✓ Visi produktu attēli tiek pievienoti CSV failam
✓ Eksportēt CSV formātā, kas ir saderīgs ar Shopify importa formātu (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Saglabāt kā XLSX (Excel dokumentu) ar atbilstošiem datu tipiem - datumi, cenas
✓ Nav nepieciešamas pārmērīgas atļaujas

Kāpēc Shopify Spy:

E-komercijas veikalu īpašniekiem Shopify Spy ļauj sekot līdzi konkurentu produktiem, cenām un akcijām. Ar šo rīku jūs ātri un viegli varat izvilkt tūkstošiem produktu no Shopify veikaliem un tos filtrēt pēc konkrētām kolekcijām.

Digitālajiem mārketinga speciālistiem Shopify Spy nodrošina precīzus un uzticamus produktu datus, kas palīdz analizēt tirgus tendences un identificēt potenciālas iespējas jūsu klientiem.

Produktu pētniekiem Shopify Spy atvieglo liela apjoma produktu datu iegūšanu ātri un efektīvi. Tas nozīmē, ka jūs varat viegli identificēt tendences un gūt ieskatu savā pētījumu jomā.

Pilnības tirdzniecības darbības veicējiem Shopify Spy ir būtisks rīks jaunu produktu meklēšanai, lai tos pievienotu savam veikalam, kā arī lai uzraudzītu esošo produktu cenas un pieejamību.

Datu analītiķiem Shopify Spy spēja izvilkt produktu datus no Shopify veikaliem un saglabāt tos CSV vai Excel formātā padara to par pievilcīgu rīku, lai ātri un efektīvi apstrādātu lielu datu apjomu.

Tātad, neatkarīgi no tā, vai esat e-komercijas veikala īpašnieks, digitālais mārketinga speciālists, produktu pētnieks, pilnības tirdzniecības darbības veicējs vai datu analītiķis, Shopify Spy ir viss, kas jums nepieciešams, lai sekotu līdzi jaunākajām produktu tendencēm un iegūtu ieskatu. Izlaidiet to šodien un paceliet savu biznesu jaunā līmenī!

Atbalstītie lauki:
- Nosaukums
- Rokturis
- Apraksts (vienkāršā tekstā)
- Izveidošanas datums un laiks
- Atjaunināšanas datums un laiks
- Pārdevējs
- Produkta tips
- Atslēgvārdi
- Maksimālā cena
- Minimālā cena
- 5 produktu varianti, ieskaitot nosaukumu, cenu, atlaidi un attēla URL
- 10 attēli
- visas opcijas

Shopify Spy പ്രൊഡക്ടുകൾ സ്ക്രേപ്പ് ചെയ്യുന്നു Shopify പ്രൊഡക്ടുകളുമായി പണിയുന്ന സ്റ്റോറുകളിൽ നിന്ന് ഒരു Excel പ്രമാണം അല്ലെങ്കിൽ CSV ഫയൽ ആയി സംരക്ഷിക്കുന്നു.

2023 Q3 മാറ്റങ്ങൾ:
- പോപ്പ്അപ്പ് അണ്ടോക്ക് ചെയ്യുക: സ്ക്രേപ്പിംഗ് പ്രഗതിയിൽ ഉള്ളതിനിടെ നിങ്ങൾക്ക് ബ്രൗസർ ഉപയോഗിക്കാം, അതേ സമയത്ത് പല സ്റ്റോറുകളും സ്ക്രേപ്പ് ചെയ്യാൻ കഴിയും
- പുതുക്കിയ ലോഗിൻ പ്രവാഹം

Shopify Spy സവിശേഷതകൾ:
✓ മിനിറ്റുകളിലായി ആയിരങ്ങളായി പ്രൊഡക്ടുകൾ എക്സ്ട്രാക്ട് ചെയ്യാനാകും
✓ പ്രത്യേക ശേഖരത്തിന് അനുസരിച്ച് ഫിൽറ്റർ ചെയ്യാൻ കഴിയും
✓ Shopify പ്രൊഡക്ട് ലിസ്റ്റിംഗിൽ നിന്നുള്ള എല്ലാ ഫീൽഡുകളും ഉൾപ്പെടുത്തിയിട്ടുണ്ട് (താഴെ കാണുക)
✓ CSV-യിലേക്ക് എല്ലാ പ്രൊഡക്ട് ചിത്രങ്ങളും ചേർത്തിരിക്കുന്നു
✓ Shopify ഇമ്പോർട്ട് ഫോർമാറ്റിനുമായി അനുയോജ്യമായ ഫോർമാറ്റിലേക്ക് CSV എക്സ്പോർട്ട് ചെയ്യാൻ കഴിയും (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ പരമ്പരാഗത ഡാറ്റ തരങ്ങളുമായി XLSX (Excel പ്രമാണം) ആയി സംരക്ഷിക്കാനാകും - തീയതികൾ, വിലകൾ
✓ അമിതമായ അനുമതികൾ ആവശ്യപ്പെടുന്നില്ല

Shopify Spy എന്തിനാണ്:

ഈ-കോമേഴ്സ് സ്റ്റോറുകളുടെ ഉടമകൾക്ക്, Shopify Spy നിങ്ങളുടെ മത്സരാർത്ഥികളുടെ പ്രൊഡക്ടുകൾ, വിലയിരുത്തൽ, പ്രൊമോഷനുകൾ പിന്തുടരാനുള്ള സൗകര്യം നൽകുന്നു. ഈ ഉപകരണത്തിനുവഴി, നിങ്ങൾക്ക് Shopify പ്രൊഡക്ടുകളെ പ്രത്യേക ശേഖരങ്ങളിൽ നിന്ന് വേഗത്തിലും എളുപ്പത്തിലും എടുക്കാം.

ഡിജിറ്റൽ മാർക്കറ്റർമാർക്ക്, Shopify Spy നിങ്ങളുടെ ക്ലയന്റുകൾക്കായി സാധ്യതകൾ കണ്ടെത്താനായി മാർക്കറ്റ് ട്രെൻഡുകൾ വിശകലനം ചെയ്യാനായി കൃത്യവും വിശ്വസനീയവുമായ പ്രൊഡക്ട് ഡാറ്റ നൽകുന്നു.

പ്രൊഡക്ട് റിസേർച്ചറുകൾക്ക്, Shopify Spy വേഗത്തിലും ദക്ഷതയോടെയും വലിയ എണ്ണം പ്രൊഡക്ടുകളുടെ ഡാറ്റ ശേഖരിക്കാൻ സാധിക്കുന്നു. ഇതിനർത്ഥം നിങ്ങളുടെ റിസേർച്ച് ഫീൽഡിൽ ട്രെൻഡുകൾക്കും സാമഗ്രികൾക്കും തിരിച്ചറിയാൻ വളരെ എളുപ്പമാണ്.

ഡ്രോപ്ഷിപ്പർമാർക്ക്, Shopify Spy നിങ്ങളുടെ സ്റ്റോറിലേക്ക് പുതിയ പ്രൊഡക്ടുകൾ കണ്ടെത്താനുള്ള അപരിഹാര്യ ഉപകരണമാണ്, നിലവിലുള്ള പ്രൊഡക്ടുകളുടെ വിലയും പ്രൊഡക്ട് ലഭ്യതയും മേല്‍നോട്ടം പിടിക്കാൻ.

ഡാറ്റ വിശകലനക്കാരുക്ക്, Shopify Spy ന്റെ പ്രൊഡക്ട് ഡാറ്റ എക്സ്ട്രാക്ട് ചെയ്യാനുള്ള കഴിവ് ഒരു CSV അല്ലെങ്കിൽ Excel ഫോർമാറ്റിലേക്ക് സംരക്ഷിക്കുന്നത് വളരെ വേഗത്തിലും ദക്ഷതയോടെയും വലിയ അളവിലുള്ള ഡാറ്റ പ്രോസസ്സ് ചെയ്യുന്നതിനുള്ള ആകർഷക ഉപകരണമാണ്.

അതിനാൽ, നിങ്ങൾ ഒ

Shopify Spy हे Shopify संचालित स्टोअरमधील उत्पादने घेऊन एक्सेल दस्तऐवज किंवा CSV फाइलमध्ये सेव्ह करते.

2023 Q3 बदल:
- अंडॉक पॉपअप: आपण स्क्रेपिंग प्रगतीत असताना ब्राउझर वापरू शकता आणि एकाच वेळी किंवा अनेक स्टोअर स्क्रेप करू शकता
- नवीनीकृत लॉगिन प्रवाह

Shopify Spy वैशिष्ट्ये:
✓ मिनिटांत आपण हजारो उत्पादने काढू शकता
✓ विशिष्ट संग्रहानुसार फिल्टर करा
✓ Shopify उत्पादन यादीतील सर्व फील्ड्स समाविष्ट आहेत (खाली पहा)
✓ सर्व उत्पादन छायाचित्र CSV मध्ये जोडल्या जातात
✓ CSV स्वरूपात निर्यात करा, जे Shopify आयात स्वरूपाशी सुसंगत आहे (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ XLSX (Excel दस्तऐवज) मध्ये योग्य डेटा प्रकारांसह सेव्ह करा - तारखा, किंमती
✓ अत्यधिक परवानग्या आवश्यक नाही

Shopify Spy का:

ई-कॉमर्स स्टोअर मालकांसाठी, Shopify Spy आपल्या प्रतिस्पर्ध्यांच्या उत्पादनांची, किंमतींची आणि प्रचारांची माहिती ठेवण्यासाठी आपल्याला परवानगी देते. ह्या साधनाच्या मदतीने, आपण Shopify संचालित स्टोअरमधून हजारो उत्पादने पत्तीत आणू शकता आणि त्यांना विशिष्ट संग्रहांनुसार फिल्टर करू शकता.

डिजिटल विपणनकर्त्यांसाठी, Shopify Spy आपल्या ग्राहकांसाठी संभाव्य संधी ओळखण्यासाठी आपल्याला खाजगी आणि विश्वसनीय उत्पादन डेटा प्रदान करते.

long.ms:
Shopify Spy scrapes products from Shopify powered stores and saves as an Excel document or CSV file.

2024 Q3 changes:
- Download a single product
- Display some store metadata
- Better handling if errors

2024 Q2 changes:
- Highly requested feature: Downloading images.
- Slow mode: Extract more fields but slower: Variant Barcode, Image Alt Text, Variant Tax Code, Variant Weight Unit
- Old "Excel" format has been renamed to "Excel (Legacy)" and will be removed in further releases
- Option to manually specify a collection handle if the list of collections is too large.
- Enhanced error handling with clearer explanations

2024 Q1 changes:
- Resolved "Out of memory" error for large stores; now, CSV/Excel files are automatically split for efficient data handling.
- Improved status messages for enhanced clarity and precision.

2023 Q3-Q4 changes:
- Undock popup: you can use browser while the scraping is in progress and even scrape several store simultaneously
- Renewed login flow

Shopify Spy features:
✓ Can extract thousands of products within minutes
✓ Filter by a specific collection
✓ All fields from Shopify product listing are included (see below)
✓ All product images are added to the CSV
✓ Download images along with CSV
✓ Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Save as XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices
✓ Does not require excessive permissions

Why Shopify Spy:

For e-commerce store owners, Shopify Spy allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. With this tool, you can quickly and easily extract thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores and filter them by specific collections.

For digital marketers, Shopify Spy provides accurate and reliable product data to help you analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients.

For product researchers, Shopify Spy makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. This means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

For dropshippers, Shopify Spy is an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store, and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products.

For data analysts, Shopify Spy's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

So, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, Shopify Spy has everything you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try it out today and take your business to the next level!

Supported Fields:
- Handle: The unique identifier for the product.
- Title: The name of the product.
- Body (HTML): The HTML description of the product.
- Vendor: The name of the product's vendor.
- Product Type: The category or type of the product.
- Tags: Keywords associated with the product.
- Published: Indicates whether the product is published or unpublished.

Options:
- Option Name
- Option Value

Variants:
- Variant SKU: The stock keeping unit for the variant.
- Variant Grams: The weight of the variant in grams.
- Variant Price: The price of the variant.
- Variant Compare At Price: The original price of the variant, used for comparison.
- Variant Inventory Qty: Inventory quantity, where 0 indicates out of stock and 1 indicates in stock.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Variants:
- Variant Barcode: The barcode for the variant.
- Variant Tax Code: The tax code associated with the variant.
- Variant Weight Unit: The unit of weight measurement for the variant.

Images:
- Image Src: The source URL of the image.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Images:
- Image Alt Text: The alternative text for the image.

Shopify Spy mengambil produk dari kedai yang digerakkan oleh Shopify dan menyimpan sebagai dokumen Excel atau fail CSV.

Perubahan Q3 2023:
- Popup yang boleh dikeluarkan: anda boleh menggunakan pelayar semasa proses pengambilan sedang berlangsung dan bahkan mengambil beberapa kedai secara serentak
- Aliran log masuk yang diperbaharui

Ciri-ciri Shopify Spy:
✓ Boleh mengekstrak ribuan produk dalam beberapa minit
✓ Menapis mengikut koleksi tertentu
✓ Semua bidang dari senarai produk Shopify disertakan (lihat di bawah)
✓ Semua imej produk ditambahkan ke CSV
✓ Eksport ke format CSV yang serasi dengan format import Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Simpan sebagai XLSX (dokumen Excel) dengan jenis data yang tepat - tarikh, harga
✓ Tidak memerlukan kebenaran yang berlebihan

Mengapa Shopify Spy:

Untuk pemilik kedai e-dagang, Shopify Spy membolehkan anda menjejaki produk, harga, dan promosi pesaing anda. Dengan alat ini, anda boleh mengekstrak ribuan produk dari kedai yang digerakkan oleh Shopify dan menapis mereka mengikut koleksi tertentu dengan cepat dan mudah.

Untuk pemasar digital, Shopify Spy menyediakan data produk yang tepat dan boleh dipercayai untuk membantu anda menganalisis trend pasaran dan mengenal pasti peluang potensial untuk pelanggan anda.

Untuk penyelidik produk, Shopify Spy memudahkan pengumpulan data tentang sejumlah besar produk dengan cepat dan cekap. Ini bermakna anda boleh mengenal pasti trend dan wawasan dalam bidang penyelidikan anda dengan mudah.

Untuk penjual dropship, Shopify Spy adalah alat penting untuk mencari produk baru untuk ditambahkan ke kedai anda, dan memantau harga dan ketersediaan produk yang sedia ada.

Untuk penganalisis data, keupayaan Shopify Spy untuk mengekstrak data produk dari kedai Shopify dan menyimpannya dalam format CSV atau Excel menjadikannya alat yang menarik untuk memproses jumlah data yang besar dengan cepat dan cekap.

Jadi, sama ada anda pemilik kedai e-dagang, pemasar digital, penyelidik produk, penjual dropship, atau penganalisis data, Shopify Spy mempunyai segala yang anda perlukan untuk kekal di atas trend dan wawasan produk terkini. Cuba hari ini dan bawa bisnes anda ke tahap seterusnya!

Bidang yang disokong:
- Tajuk
- Pemegang
- Penerangan (dalam teks biasa)
- Tarikh dan masa dicipta
- Tarikh dan masa dikemaskini
- Penjual
- Jenis Produk
- Tag
- Harga maksimum
- Harga minimum
- 5 varian produk termasuk tajuk, harga, harga diskaun, dan URL imej
- 10 imej
- semua pilihan

Introducing "Spy Shopify Scraper & Parser", the ultimate chrome extension that allows you to meticulously scrape and parse products from Shopify powered stores. The Spy Shopify extension will transform the way you conduct your e-commerce business, digital marketing, product research, dropshipping, and data analysis.

With the Spy Shopify Scraper & Parser, you can:
- Extract thousands of products within minutes
- Filter by a specific collection
- Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format
- Save as an Excel document with proper data types - dates, prices

As an e-commerce store owner, Spy Shopify helps you stay ahead of your competitors by keeping you updated on their products, pricing, and promotions. This is your ultimate tool to spy Shopify-powered stores, enabling you to extract thousands of products and filter them by specific collections swiftly and effortlessly.

For digital marketers, Spy Shopify is your ally in providing accurate and reliable product data. It helps you spy Shopify market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients. With Spy Shopify, you won't miss out on any valuable information that can enhance your marketing strategies.

Product researchers will find Spy Shopify an invaluable tool for gathering data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. You can spy Shopify product listings, identify trends, and gain insights in your field of research with ease, all thanks to Spy Shopify.

Dropshippers, Spy Shopify is a must-have tool for you. It allows you to spy Shopify stores for new products to add to your store and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products.

Data analysts, Spy Shopify's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format makes it an easy-to-use tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

In summary, Spy Shopify Scraper & Parser is a comprehensive tool designed to cater to various needs, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst. Spy Shopify is here to revolutionize the way you do business.

The Spy Shopify Scraper & Parser supports fields such as: 
- Title
- Handle
- Description (in plain text)
- Created date and time
- Updated date and time
- Vendor
- Product Type
- Tags
- Max price
- Min price
- 5 product variants including title, price, discount price, and image URL
- 10 images
- all options

Try out Spy Shopify today and elevate your business to new heights!

Shopify Spy schraapt producten van Shopify aangedreven winkels en slaat deze op als een Excel-document of CSV-bestand.

Veranderingen in 2023 Q3:
- Loskoppelen popup: je kunt de browser gebruiken terwijl het schrapen aan de gang is en zelfs meerdere winkels tegelijk schrapen
- Vernieuwde loginstroom

Functies van Shopify Spy:
✓ Kan binnen enkele minuten duizenden producten extraheren
✓ Filteren op een specifieke collectie
✓ Alle velden van de Shopify-productvermelding zijn inbegrepen (zie hieronder)
✓ Alle productafbeeldingen worden toegevoegd aan de CSV
✓ Exporteren naar CSV-formaat compatibel met Shopify importformaat (https://help.shopify.com/nl/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Opslaan als XLSX (Excel-document) met de juiste datatypes - datums, prijzen
✓ Vereist geen buitensporige machtigingen

Waarom Shopify Spy:

Voor e-commerce winkel eigenaren stelt Shopify Spy je in staat om de producten, prijzen en promoties van je concurrenten bij te houden. Met deze tool kun je snel en gemakkelijk duizenden producten extraheren uit Shopify-aangedreven winkels en deze filteren op specifieke collecties.

Voor digitale marketeers biedt Shopify Spy nauwkeurige en betrouwbare productgegevens om u te helpen markttrends te analyseren en potentiële kansen voor uw klanten te identificeren.

Voor productonderzoekers maakt Shopify Spy het gemakkelijk om gegevens over een groot aantal producten snel en efficiënt te verzamelen. Dit betekent dat je op een gemakkelijke manier trends en inzichten in je onderzoeksgebied kunt identificeren.

Voor dropshippers is Shopify Spy een essentieel hulpmiddel om nieuwe producten te vinden om aan je winkel toe te voegen, en de prijzen en productbeschikbaarheid voor je bestaande producten te monitoren.

Voor data-analisten is het vermogen van Shopify Spy om productgegevens uit Shopify-winkels te extraheren en op te slaan in een CSV- of Excel-formaat een aantrekkelijke tool voor het snel en efficiënt verwerken van grote hoeveelheden gegevens.

Dus, of je nu een e-commerce winkel eigenaar, digitale marketeer, productonderzoeker, dropshipper of data-analist bent, Shopify Spy heeft alles wat je nodig hebt om op de hoogte te blijven van de nieuwste producttrends en inzichten. Probeer het vandaag nog uit en breng je bedrijf naar het volgende niveau!

Ondersteunde velden:

- Handvat
- Beschrijving (in platte tekst)
- Aanmaakdatum en tijd
- Bijgewerkte datum en tijd
- Verkoper
- Producttype
- Labels
- Maximale prijs
- Minimale prijs
- 5 productvarianten inclusief titel, prijs, kortingsprijs en afbeeldings-URL
- 10 afbeeldingen
- alle opties

Shopify Spy skraper produkter fra Shopify-drevne butikker og lagrer som et Excel-dokument eller CSV-fil.

Endringer i Q3 2023:
- Løsrevet popup: du kan bruke nettleseren mens skrapingen pågår og til og med skrape flere butikker samtidig
- Fornyet innloggingsflyt

Funksjoner i Shopify Spy:
✓ Kan trekke ut tusenvis av produkter i løpet av minutter
✓ Filtrer etter en spesifikk samling

✓ Alle produktbilder legges til i CSV
✓ Eksporter til CSV-format som er kompatibelt med Shopify importformat (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Lagre som XLSX (Excel-dokument) med riktige datatyper - datoer, priser
✓ Krever ikke overdreven tillatelser

Hvorfor Shopify Spy:

For e-handelsbutikkeiere gir Shopify Spy deg mulighet til å holde oversikt over konkurrentenes produkter, priser og kampanjer. Med dette verktøyet kan du raskt og enkelt trekke ut tusenvis av produkter fra Shopify-drevne butikker og filtrere dem etter spesifikke samlinger.

For digitale markedsførere gir Shopify Spy nøyaktige og pålitelige produktdatene for å hjelpe deg med å analysere markeds trender og identifisere potensielle muligheter for kundene dine.

For dataanalytikere, gjør Shopify Spy's evne til å trekke ut produktdata fra Shopify butikker og lagre det i et CSV- eller Excel-format det til et attraktivt verktøy for å behandle store mengder data raskt og effektivt.

Så, enten du er en e-handelsbutikkeier, digital markedsfører, produktforsker, dropshipper, eller dataanalytiker, har Shopify Spy alt du trenger for å holde deg oppdatert på de nyeste produkt trendene og innsikten. Prøv det ut i dag og ta virksomheten din til neste nivå!

long.pl:
Shopify Spy scrapes products from Shopify powered stores and saves as an Excel document or CSV file.

2024 Q3 changes:
- Download a single product
- Display some store metadata
- Better handling if errors

2024 Q2 changes:
- Highly requested feature: Downloading images.
- Slow mode: Extract more fields but slower: Variant Barcode, Image Alt Text, Variant Tax Code, Variant Weight Unit
- Old "Excel" format has been renamed to "Excel (Legacy)" and will be removed in further releases
- Option to manually specify a collection handle if the list of collections is too large.
- Enhanced error handling with clearer explanations

2024 Q1 changes:
- Resolved "Out of memory" error for large stores; now, CSV/Excel files are automatically split for efficient data handling.
- Improved status messages for enhanced clarity and precision.

2023 Q3-Q4 changes:
- Undock popup: you can use browser while the scraping is in progress and even scrape several store simultaneously
- Renewed login flow

Shopify Spy features:
✓ Can extract thousands of products within minutes
✓ Filter by a specific collection
✓ All fields from Shopify product listing are included (see below)
✓ All product images are added to the CSV
✓ Download images along with CSV
✓ Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Save as XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices
✓ Does not require excessive permissions

Why Shopify Spy:

For e-commerce store owners, Shopify Spy allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. With this tool, you can quickly and easily extract thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores and filter them by specific collections.

For digital marketers, Shopify Spy provides accurate and reliable product data to help you analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients.

For product researchers, Shopify Spy makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. This means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

For dropshippers, Shopify Spy is an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store, and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products.

For data analysts, Shopify Spy's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

So, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, Shopify Spy has everything you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try it out today and take your business to the next level!

Supported Fields:
- Handle: The unique identifier for the product.
- Title: The name of the product.
- Body (HTML): The HTML description of the product.
- Vendor: The name of the product's vendor.
- Product Type: The category or type of the product.
- Tags: Keywords associated with the product.
- Published: Indicates whether the product is published or unpublished.

Options:
- Option Name
- Option Value

Variants:
- Variant SKU: The stock keeping unit for the variant.
- Variant Grams: The weight of the variant in grams.
- Variant Price: The price of the variant.
- Variant Compare At Price: The original price of the variant, used for comparison.
- Variant Inventory Qty: Inventory quantity, where 0 indicates out of stock and 1 indicates in stock.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Variants:
- Variant Barcode: The barcode for the variant.
- Variant Tax Code: The tax code associated with the variant.
- Variant Weight Unit: The unit of weight measurement for the variant.

Images:
- Image Src: The source URL of the image.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Images:
- Image Alt Text: The alternative text for the image.

Rozszerzenie z marką: `Shopify spy scraper & parser` oraz tytułem `Wyodrębnij listę produktów ze sklepów Shopify do Excela/CSV` przetłumacz na język polski. 

Nie pomijaj znaków nowego wiersza i nie używaj dodatkowych cudzysłowów.

Przetłumacz poniższe:
Shopify Spy skreśla produkty ze sklepów zasilanych przez Shopify i zapisuje je jako dokument Excela lub plik CSV.

Zmiany na III kwartał 2023:
- Odczepiany popup: można korzystać z przeglądarki podczas trwania skreślania, a nawet skreślić kilka sklepów jednocześnie
- Odnowiony proces logowania

Funkcje Shopify Spy:
✓ Może wyodrębnić tysiące produktów w ciągu kilku minut
✓ Filtruj według konkretnej kolekcji
✓ Wszystkie pola z listy produktów Shopify są uwzględnione (patrz poniżej)
✓ Wszystkie obrazy produktów są dodawane do pliku CSV
✓ Eksport do formatu CSV kompatybilnego z formatem importu Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Zapisz jako XLSX (dokument Excela) z właściwymi typami danych - daty, ceny
✓ Nie wymaga nadmiernych uprawnień

Dlaczego Shopify Spy:

Dla właścicieli sklepów e-commerce, Shopify Spy pozwala śledzić produkty, ceny i promocje swoich konkurentów. Za pomocą tego narzędzia szybko i łatwo możesz wyodrębnić tysiące produktów ze sklepów zasilanych przez Shopify i filtrować je według konkretnych kolekcji.

Dla marketerów cyfrowych, Shopify Spy dostarcza dokładne i wiarygodne dane o produktach, które pomagają analizować trendy rynkowe i identyfikować potencjalne możliwości dla Twoich klientów.

Dla badaczy produktów, Shopify Spy ułatwia gromadzenie danych na temat dużej liczby produktów szybko i efektywnie. Oznacza to, że łatwo możesz zidentyfikować trendy i wglądy w swojej dziedzinie badań.

Dla dropshipperów, Shopify Spy jest niezbędnym narzędziem do wyszukiwania nowych produktów do dodania do swojego sklepu oraz monitorowania cen i dostępności produktów.

Dla analityków danych, możliwość wyodrębnienia danych o produktach ze sklepów Shopify przez Shopify Spy i zapisania ich w formacie CSV lub Excela sprawia, że jest to atrakcyjne narzędzie do przetwarzania dużych ilości danych szybko i efektywnie.

Czy jesteś właścicielem sklepu e-commerce, marketerem cyfrowym, badaczem produktów, dropshipperem czy analitykiem danych, Shopify Spy ma wszystko, czego potrzebujesz, aby być na bieżąco z najnowszymi trendami i wglądami w produkty. Wypróbuj już dziś i przenieś swój biznes na wyższy poziom!

Obsługiwane pola:
- Tytuł
- Uchwyt
- Opis (w postaci zwykłego tekstu)
- Data i godzina utworzenia
- Data i godzina aktualizacji
- Sprzedawca
- Typ produktu
- Tagi
- Maksymalna cena
- Minimalna cena
- 5 wariantów produktu, w tym tytuł, cena, cena promocyjna i adres URL obrazu
- 10 obrazów
- wszystkie opcje

✓ Não requer permissões excessivas

Por que o Shopify Spy:

Para proprietários de lojas de comércio eletrônico, o Shopify Spy permite que você acompanhe os produtos, preços e promoções de seus concorrentes. Com esta ferramenta, você pode extrair rapidamente milhares de produtos de lojas alimentadas pelo Shopify e filtrá-los por coleções específicas.

Para profissionais de marketing digital, o Shopify Spy fornece dados de produtos precisos e confiáveis para ajudá-lo a analisar tendências de mercado e identificar potenciais oportunidades para seus clientes.

Para pesquisadores de produtos, o Shopify Spy facilita a coleta de dados em um grande número de produtos de maneira rápida e eficiente. Isso significa que você pode identificar tendências e insights em seu campo de pesquisa com facilidade.

Para dropshippers, o Shopify Spy é uma ferramenta essencial para encontrar novos produtos para adicionar à sua loja e monitorar preços e disponibilidade de produtos existentes.

Para analistas de dados, a capacidade do Shopify Spy de extrair dados de produtos das lojas Shopify e salvá-los em formato CSV ou Excel torna-o uma ferramenta atraente para processar grandes quantidades de dados de maneira rápida e eficiente.

Então, seja você um proprietário de loja de comércio eletrônico, profissional de marketing digital, pesquisador de produtos, dropshipper ou analista de dados, o Shopify Spy tem tudo que você precisa para ficar por dentro das últimas tendências e insights de produtos. - 10 imagens

Modificări 2023 Q3:
- Popup detașabil: puteți utiliza browserul în timp ce răzuirea este în curs și chiar puteți răzui simultan mai multe magazine

Caracteristicile Shopify Spy:
✓ Poate extrage mii de produse în câteva minute
✓ Filtrare după o colecție specifică

De ce Shopify Spy:

Pentru proprietarii de magazine de comerț electronic, Shopify Spy vă permite să urmăriți produsele, prețurile și promoțiile concurenților dvs. Cu acest instrument, puteți extrage rapid și ușor mii de produse din magazinele alimentate de Shopify și să le filtrați după colecții specifice.

Pentru marketerii digitali, Shopify Spy oferă date precise și fiabile despre produse pentru a vă ajuta să analizați tendințele pieței și să identificați oportunități potențiale pentru clienții dvs.

Pentru cercetătorii de produse, Shopify Spy facilitează colectarea de date despre un număr mare de produse în mod rapid și eficient. Acest lucru înseamnă că puteți identifica tendințe și informații în domeniul dvs. de cercetare cu ușurință.

Pentru dropshipperi, Shopify Spy este un instrument esențial pentru a găsi noi produse de adăugat în magazinul dvs. și pentru a monitoriza prețurile și disponibilitatea produselor existente.

Pentru analiștii de date, capacitatea Shopify Spy de a extrage date despre produse din magazinele Shopify și de a le salva în format CSV sau Excel o face un instrument atractiv pentru procesarea rapidă și eficientă a unor cantități mari de date.

Почему Shopify Spy:

Для владельцев интернет-магазинов, Shopify Spy позволяет отслеживать товары, цены и акции конкурентов. С помощью этого инструмента вы можете быстро и легко извлечь тысячи товаров из магазинов на платформе Shopify и отфильтровать их по конкретным коллекциям.

Для цифровых маркетологов, Shopify Spy предоставляет точные и надежные данные о товарах, которые помогут вам анализировать тренды рынка и определить потенциальные возможности для ваших клиентов.

Для исследователей товаров, Shopify Spy упрощает сбор данных о большом количестве товаров быстро и эффективно. Это означает, что вы можете легко определить тренды и инсайты в вашей области исследований.

Для дропшипперов, Shopify Spy является необходимым инструментом для поиска новых товаров для добавления в ваш магазин, а также для мониторинга цен и доступности товаров.

Shopify Spy vyberá produkty z obchodov poháňaných Shopify a ukladá ich ako dokument Excel alebo súbor CSV.

Zmeny v Q3 2023:
- Odpojenie kontextového okna: môžete používať prehliadač počas prebiehajúceho vyberania a dokonca vyberať z niekoľkých obchodov súčasne
- Obnovený prihlasovací proces

Funkcie Shopify Spy:
✓ Dokáže extrahovať tisíce produktov za minúty
✓ Filtrovanie podľa konkrétnej kolekcie
✓ Sú zahrnuté všetky polia z produktového zoznamu Shopify (pozri nižšie)
✓ Všetky obrázky produktov sú pridané do CSV
✓ Export do formátu CSV kompatibilného s formátom importu Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Uložte ako XLSX (dokument Excel) s vhodnými typmi dát - dátumy, ceny
✓ Nevyžaduje sa nadmerné povolenia

Prečo Shopify Spy:

Pre majiteľov e-shopov umožňuje Shopify Spy sledovať produkty, ceny a akcie vašich konkurentov. S týmto nástrojom môžete rýchlo a ľahko extrahovať tisíce produktov z obchodov poháňaných Shopify a filtrovať ich podľa konkrétnych kolekcií.

Pre digitálnych marketérov poskytuje Shopify Spy presné a spoľahlivé údaje o produktoch, ktoré pomáhajú analyzovať trhové trendy a identifikovať potenciálne príležitosti pre vašich klientov.

Pre výskumníkov produktov uľahčuje Shopify Spy zhromažďovanie údajov o veľkom počte produktov rýchlo a efektívne. To znamená, že môžete ľahko identifikovať trendy a zistenia vo vašom obore výskumu.

Pre dodávateľov je Shopify Spy nevyhnutným nástrojom na nájdenie nových produktov, ktoré chcete pridať do svojho obchodu, a sledovanie cien a dostupnosti produktov pre vaše existujúce produkty.

Pre analytikov údajov je schopnosť Shopify Spy extrahovať údaje o produktoch z obchodov Shopify a ukladať ich v CSV alebo Excel formáte atraktívnym nástrojom na spracovanie veľkého množstva údajov rýchlo a efektívne.

Takže, či už ste majiteľom e-shopu, digitálnym marketérom, výskumníkom produktov, dodávateľom alebo analytikom údajov, Shopify Spy má všetko, čo potrebujete na sledovanie najnovších trendov a poznatkov o produktoch. Vyskúšajte ho ešte dnes a posuňte svoje podnikanie na ďalšiu úroveň!

- Predajca

- Maximálna cena
- Minimálna cena
- 5 variantov produktu vrátane názvu, ceny, zľavovanej ceny a URL obrázku
- 10 obrázkov
- všetky možnosti

Shopify Spy iz Shopify trgovin pridobiva izdelke in jih shrani kot dokument Excel ali CSV datoteko.

Spremembe za 3. četrtletje 2023:
- Odstranjevanje pojavnega okna: medtem ko poteka pridobivanje podatkov, lahko uporabljate brskalnik in celo pridobivate podatke iz več trgovin hkrati
- Obnovljen postopek prijave

Funkcije Shopify Spy:
✓ Lahko izlušči tisoče izdelkov v nekaj minutah
✓ Filtriranje po specifični kolekciji
✓ Vključena so vsa polja s seznama izdelkov Shopify (glej spodaj)
✓ Vse slike izdelkov so dodane v CSV
✓ Izvoz v format CSV, združljiv s formatom za uvoz Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Shrani kot XLSX (dokument Excel) z ustreznimi vrstami podatkov - datumi, cene
✓ Ne zahteva pretiranih dovoljenj

Zakaj Shopify Spy:

Za lastnike spletnih trgovin Shopify Spy omogoča sledenje izdelkom, cenam in promocijam vaših konkurentov. S tem orodjem lahko hitro in enostavno izluščite tisoče izdelkov iz trgovin, ki jih poganja Shopify, in jih filtrirate po specifičnih kolekcijah.

Za digitalne tržnike Shopify Spy zagotavlja natančne in zanesljive podatke o izdelkih, ki vam pomagajo analizirati tržne trende in prepoznati potencialne priložnosti za vaše stranke.

Za raziskovalce izdelkov Shopify Spy olajša zbiranje podatkov o velikem številu izdelkov hitro in učinkovito. To pomeni, da lahko z lahkoto prepoznate trende in vpoglede na vašem področju raziskav.

Za dropshipperje je Shopify Spy bistveno orodje za iskanje novih izdelkov, ki jih lahko dodate v svojo trgovino, in za spremljanje cen in razpoložljivosti izdelkov.

Za analitike podatkov zmožnost Shopify Spy, da izlušči podatke o izdelkih iz trgovin Shopify in jih shrani v formatu CSV ali Excel, predstavlja privlačno orodje za hitro in učinkovito obdelavo velikih količin podatkov.

Torej, ne glede na to, ali ste lastnik spletne trgovine, digitalni tržnik, raziskovalec izdelkov, dropshipper ali analitik podatkov, ima Shopify Spy vse, kar potrebujete, da ostanete na tekočem z najnovejšimi trendi in vpogledi v izdelke. Preizkusite ga danes in povzdignite svoje poslovanje na višjo raven!

- Vrsta izdelka
- Oznake
- Najvišja cena
- Najnižja cena
- 5 variant izdelkov, vključno z naslovom, ceno, znižano ceno in URL-jem slike
- 10 slik
- vse možnosti

Zašto Shopify Spy:

Za vlasnike e-prodavnica, Shopify Spy vam omogućava da pratite proizvode, cene i promocije vaših konkurenata. Pomoću ovog alata, možete brzo i lako izvući hiljade proizvoda iz Shopify prodavnica i filtrirati ih po specifičnim kolekcijama.

Za digitalne marketinške stručnjake, Shopify Spy pruža tačne i pouzdane podatke o proizvodima koji vam mogu pomoći da analizirate trendove na tržištu i identifikujete potencijalne prilike za vaše klijente.

Za istraživače proizvoda, Shopify Spy olakšava prikupljanje podataka o velikom broju proizvoda brzo i efikasno. To znači da možete lako identifikovati trendove i uvide u vašem polju istraživanja.

Za dropshipere, Shopify Spy je neophodan alat za pronalaženje novih proizvoda koje možete dodati u svoju prodavnicu, kao i za praćenje cena i dostupnosti proizvoda.

Za analitičare podataka, sposobnost Shopify Spy da izvuče podatke o proizvodima iz Shopify prodavnica i sačuva ih u CSV ili Excel formatu čini ga privlačnim alatom za obradu velike količine podataka brzo i efikasno.

Dakle, bilo da ste vlasnik e-prodavnice, digitalni marketinški stručnjak, istraživač proizvoda, dropshiper ili analitičar podataka, Shopify Spy ima sve što vam je potrebno da budete u toku sa najnovijim trendovima i uvidima u proizvode. Isprobajte ga danas i podignite svoj posao na viši nivo!

Podržana polja:
- Naslov
- Rukovodilac
- Opis (u običnom tekstu)
- Datum i vreme kreiranja
- Datum i vreme ažuriranja
- Prodavac
- Tip proizvoda
- Oznake
- Maksimalna cena
- Minimalna cena
- 5 varijanti proizvoda uključujući naslov, cenu, sniženu cenu i URL slike
- 10 slika
- sve opcije
long.sv:
Shopify Spy scrapes products from Shopify powered stores and saves as an Excel document or CSV file.

2024 Q3 changes:
- Download a single product
- Display some store metadata
- Better handling if errors

2024 Q2 changes:
- Highly requested feature: Downloading images.
- Slow mode: Extract more fields but slower: Variant Barcode, Image Alt Text, Variant Tax Code, Variant Weight Unit
- Old "Excel" format has been renamed to "Excel (Legacy)" and will be removed in further releases
- Option to manually specify a collection handle if the list of collections is too large.
- Enhanced error handling with clearer explanations

2024 Q1 changes:
- Resolved "Out of memory" error for large stores; now, CSV/Excel files are automatically split for efficient data handling.
- Improved status messages for enhanced clarity and precision.

2023 Q3-Q4 changes:
- Undock popup: you can use browser while the scraping is in progress and even scrape several store simultaneously
- Renewed login flow

Shopify Spy features:
✓ Can extract thousands of products within minutes
✓ Filter by a specific collection
✓ All fields from Shopify product listing are included (see below)
✓ All product images are added to the CSV
✓ Download images along with CSV
✓ Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Save as XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices
✓ Does not require excessive permissions

Why Shopify Spy:

For e-commerce store owners, Shopify Spy allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. With this tool, you can quickly and easily extract thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores and filter them by specific collections.

For digital marketers, Shopify Spy provides accurate and reliable product data to help you analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients.

For product researchers, Shopify Spy makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. This means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

For dropshippers, Shopify Spy is an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store, and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products.

For data analysts, Shopify Spy's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

So, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, Shopify Spy has everything you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try it out today and take your business to the next level!

Supported Fields:
- Handle: The unique identifier for the product.
- Title: The name of the product.
- Body (HTML): The HTML description of the product.
- Vendor: The name of the product's vendor.
- Product Type: The category or type of the product.
- Tags: Keywords associated with the product.
- Published: Indicates whether the product is published or unpublished.

Options:
- Option Name
- Option Value

Variants:
- Variant SKU: The stock keeping unit for the variant.
- Variant Grams: The weight of the variant in grams.
- Variant Price: The price of the variant.
- Variant Compare At Price: The original price of the variant, used for comparison.
- Variant Inventory Qty: Inventory quantity, where 0 indicates out of stock and 1 indicates in stock.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Variants:
- Variant Barcode: The barcode for the variant.
- Variant Tax Code: The tax code associated with the variant.
- Variant Weight Unit: The unit of weight measurement for the variant.

Images:
- Image Src: The source URL of the image.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Images:
- Image Alt Text: The alternative text for the image.

Shopify Spy skrapar produkter från Shopify-drivna butiker och sparar som ett Excel-dokument eller CSV-fil.

Ändringar i 2023 Q3:
- Också popup: du kan använda webbläsaren medan skrapningen pågår och till och med skrapa flera butiker samtidigt
- Förnyat inloggningsflöde

Shopify Spy-funktioner:
✓ Kan extrahera tusentals produkter inom några minuter
✓ Filtrera efter en specifik samling
✓ Alla fält från Shopify produktlista ingår (se nedan)
✓ Alla produktbilder läggs till i CSV
✓ Exportera till CSV-format kompatibelt med Shopify importformat (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Spara som XLSX (Excel-dokument) med korrekta datatyper - datum, priser
✓ Kräver inte överdrivna behörigheter

Varför Shopify Spy:

För e-handelsbutiksägare, Shopify Spy låter dig hålla koll på dina konkurrenters produkter, prissättning och kampanjer. Med detta verktyg kan du snabbt och enkelt extrahera tusentals produkter från Shopify-drivna butiker och filtrera dem efter specifika samlingar.

För digitala marknadsförare, Shopify Spy ger korrekta och tillförlitliga produktdata för att hjälpa dig analysera marknadstrender och identifiera potentiella möjligheter för dina kunder.

För produktforskare, Shopify Spy gör det lätt att samla data om ett stort antal produkter snabbt och effektivt. Detta betyder att du kan identifiera trender och insikter i ditt forskningsområde med lätthet.

För dropshippers, Shopify Spy är ett viktigt verktyg för att hitta nya produkter att lägga till i din butik, och övervaka prissättning och produkt tillgänglighet för dina befintliga produkter.

För dataanalytiker, Shopify Spy's förmåga att extrahera produktdata från Shopify-butiker och spara det i ett CSV- eller Excel-format gör det till ett attraktivt verktyg för att bearbeta stora mängder data snabbt och effektivt.

Så, oavsett om du är en e-handelsbutiksägare, digital marknadsförare, produktforskare, dropshipper eller dataanalytiker, har Shopify Spy allt du behöver för att hålla dig uppdaterad med de senaste produkt trenderna och insikterna. Prova det idag och ta din verksamhet till nästa nivå!

Stödda fält:
- Titel
- Handtag
- Beskrivning (i klartext)
- Skapat datum och tid
- Uppdaterat datum och tid
- Leverantör
- Produkttyp
- Taggar
- Maxpris
- Minpris
- 5 produktvarianter inklusive titel, pris, rabatterat pris och bild-URL
- 10 bilder
- alla alternativ

Shopify Spy huchuja bidhaa kutoka maduka yanayotumia Shopify na kuziweka kama hati ya Excel au faili ya CSV.

Mabadiliko ya Q3 2023:
- Undock popup: unaweza kutumia kivinjari huku uchujaji ukiendelea na hata kuchuja maduka kadhaa kwa wakati mmoja
- Mtiririko wa kuingia umeboreshwa

Vipengele vya Shopify Spy:
✓ Inaweza kuchuja maelfu ya bidhaa ndani ya dakika
✓ Chuja kwa mkusanyiko maalum
✓ Maeneo yote kutoka kwenye orodha ya bidhaa ya Shopify yamejumuishwa (tazama chini)
✓ Picha zote za bidhaa zimeongezwa kwenye CSV
✓ Peleka kwa muundo wa CSV unaolingana na muundo wa kuagiza wa Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Hifadhi kama XLSX (hati ya Excel) na aina sahihi za data - tarehe, bei
✓ Haidhuru ruhusa kupita kiasi

Kwa nini Shopify Spy:

Kwa wamiliki wa maduka ya e-commerce, Shopify Spy inakuwezesha kufuatilia bidhaa, bei, na matangazo ya washindani wako. Kwa zana hii, unaweza kuchuja haraka na kwa urahisi maelfu ya bidhaa kutoka kwenye maduka yanayotumia Shopify na kuyachuja kwa mkusanyiko maalum.

Kwa wauzaji wa digitali, Shopify Spy hutoa data sahihi na ya kuaminika ya bidhaa kukusaidia kuchambua mwenendo wa soko na kutambua fursa zinazowezekana kwa wateja wako.

Kwa watafiti wa bidhaa, Shopify Spy inafanya iwe rahisi kukusanya data kwenye idadi kubwa ya bidhaa kwa haraka na ufanisi. Hii inamaanisha unaweza kutambua mwenendo na ufahamu katika uwanja wako wa utafiti kwa urahisi.

Kwa dropshippers, Shopify Spy ni zana muhimu kwa kutafuta bidhaa mpya za kuongeza kwenye duka lako, na kufuatilia bei na upatikanaji wa bidhaa zako zilizopo.

Kwa wachambuzi wa data, uwezo wa Shopify Spy wa kuchuja data ya bidhaa kutoka kwenye maduka ya Shopify na kuiweka kwenye muundo wa CSV au Excel inaifanya iwe zana inayovutia kwa kusindika idadi kubwa ya data kwa haraka na ufanisi.

Kwa hivyo, ikiwa wewe ni mmiliki wa duka la e-commerce, muuzaji wa digitali, mtafiti wa bidhaa, dropshipper, au mchambuzi wa data, Shopify Spy ina kila kitu unachohitaji kusalia juu ya mwenendo wa bidhaa na ufahamu. Jaribu leo na upeleke biashara yako kwenye kiwango kinachofuata!

Maeneo yanayoungwa mkono:
- Kichwa
- Handle
- Maelezo (kwa maandishi wazi)
- Tarehe na wakati wa kuunda
- Tarehe na wakati wa kusasisha
- Muuzaji
- Aina ya Bidhaa
- Lebo
- Bei ya juu zaidi
- Bei ya chini zaidi
- Aina 5 za bidhaa zikiwemo kichwa, bei, bei ya punguzo, na URL ya picha
- Picha 10
- chaguzi zote
