Shopify Spy ஆன் பொருட்களை Shopify ஆதரிக்கும் கடைகளில் இருந்து பிடிக்கி அதை Excel ஆவணமாகவோ அல்லது CSV கோப்பாகவோ சேமிக்கின்றது.

2023 Q3 மாற்றங்கள்:
- அண்டாக் பாப்அப்: பிடிப்பு முடிவடையும்வரை உங்கள் உலாவியைப் பயன்படுத்த முடியும், மேலும் ஒரே நேரத்தில் பல கடைகளையும் பிடிக்க முடியும்
- புதுப்பிக்கப்பட்ட உள்நுழைவு வழிசெலவு

Shopify Spy அம்சங்கள்:
✓ நிமிடங்களுக்குள் ஆயிரக்கணக்கான பொருட்களை பிடிக்க முடியும்
✓ குறிப்பிட்ட சேகரிப்பில் வடிகட்ட முடியும்
✓ Shopify பொருட்களின் பட்டியலில் இருந்து அனைத்து புலங்களும் சேர்க்கப்பட்டுள்ளன (கீழேயே உள்ளது)
✓ அனைத்து பொருட் படங்களும் CSV க்கு சேர்க்கப்படுகின்றன
✓ Shopify இறக்குமதி வடிவத்துடன் ஒத்திசைவாக CSV வடிவத்தில் ஏற்றுமதி செய்யலாம் (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ தகுதியான தரவு வகைகளுடன் XLSX (Excel ஆவணம்) ஆக சேமிக்கலாம் - தேதிகள், விலைகள்
✓ அதிகமான அனுமதிகளை வேண்டியதில்லை

Shopify Spy ஏன்:

மின்வணிக கடைகளின் உரிமையாளர்களுக்கு, Shopify Spy உங்கள் போட்டியாளர்களின் பொருட்கள், விலை, மற்றும் பரிமோசன்களை கண்காணிக்க அனுமதிக்கின்றது. இந்த கருவியுடன், நீங்கள் விரைவாகவும், எளிதாகவும் Shopify ஆதரிக்கும் கடைகளிலிருந்து ஆயிரக்கணக்கான பொருட்களை பிடிக்கி, குறிப்பிட்ட சேகரிப்புகளில் அவற்றை வடிகட்ட முடியும்.

மின்னணு விற்பனையாளர்களுக்கு, Shopify Spy உங்கள் வாடிக்கையாளர்களுக்கான சாத்தியமான வாய்ப்புகளைக் கண்டறிய உதவுவதற்காக சரியான மற்றும் நம்பகத்தன்மையான பொருட் தரவை வழங்குகின்றது.

பொருட் ஆராய்ச்சியாளர்களுக்கு, Shopify Spy விரைவாகவும் திறமையாகவும் பெரிய அளவில் பொருட்கள் மீது தரவை சேகரிக்கவதை எளிதாக்குகின்றது. இது உங்கள் ஆராய்ச்சி துறையில் புகார்களையும், உள்ளூர்களையும் அடைய முடியும்.

டிராப்ஷிப்பர்களுக்கு, Shopify Spy உங்கள் கடைக்கு புதிய பொருட்களைச் சேர்க்க ஒரு அவசிய கருவி ஆகும், மேலும் உங்கள் ஏற்கனவே உள்ள பொருட்களுக்கான விலையையும், பொருட் கிடைப்பதையும் கவனிக்க முடியும்.

தரவு பகுப்பாய்வாளர்களுக்கு, Shopify Spy அதன் Shopify கடைகளிலிருந்து பொருட் தரவை பிடித்து, அதை CSV அல்லது Excel வடிவத்தில் சேமிக்க முடியும் திறன் பெரிய அளவில் தரவை விரைவாகவும் திறமையாகவும் செயலாக்குவதற்கான ஆர்வத்தின் கருவியாக இருக்கின்றது.

எனவே, நீங்கள் மின்வணிக கடை உரிமையாளர், மின்னணு விற்பனையாளர், பொருட் ஆராய்ச்சியாளர், டிராப்ஷிப்பர், அல்லது தரவு பகுப்பாய்வாளர் ஆக இருந்தாலும், Shopify Spy உங்களுக்கு அதிகப்படியான பொருட் புகார்கள் மற்றும் உள்ளூர்களை கண்காணிக்க தேவையான அனைத்தையும் வழங்குகின்றது. இன்றே அதை முயற்சித்து, உங்கள் வணிகத்தை அடுத்த அளவுக்கு கொண்டுவருங்கள்!

ஆதரிக்கப்படும் புலங்கள்:
- தலைப்பு
- கையிருப்பு
- விளக்கம் (எளிய உரையில்)
- உருவாக்கப்பட்ட தேதி மற்றும் நேரம்
- புதுப்பிக்கப்பட்ட தேதி மற
long.te:
Shopify Spy scrapes products from Shopify powered stores and saves as an Excel document or CSV file.

2024 Q3 changes:
- Download a single product
- Display some store metadata
- Better handling if errors

2024 Q2 changes:
- Highly requested feature: Downloading images.
- Slow mode: Extract more fields but slower: Variant Barcode, Image Alt Text, Variant Tax Code, Variant Weight Unit
- Old "Excel" format has been renamed to "Excel (Legacy)" and will be removed in further releases
- Option to manually specify a collection handle if the list of collections is too large.
- Enhanced error handling with clearer explanations

2024 Q1 changes:
- Resolved "Out of memory" error for large stores; now, CSV/Excel files are automatically split for efficient data handling.
- Improved status messages for enhanced clarity and precision.

2023 Q3-Q4 changes:
- Undock popup: you can use browser while the scraping is in progress and even scrape several store simultaneously
- Renewed login flow

Shopify Spy features:
✓ Can extract thousands of products within minutes
✓ Filter by a specific collection
✓ All fields from Shopify product listing are included (see below)
✓ All product images are added to the CSV
✓ Download images along with CSV
✓ Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Save as XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices
✓ Does not require excessive permissions

Why Shopify Spy:

For e-commerce store owners, Shopify Spy allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. With this tool, you can quickly and easily extract thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores and filter them by specific collections.

For digital marketers, Shopify Spy provides accurate and reliable product data to help you analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients.

For product researchers, Shopify Spy makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. This means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

For dropshippers, Shopify Spy is an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store, and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products.

For data analysts, Shopify Spy's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

So, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, Shopify Spy has everything you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try it out today and take your business to the next level!

Supported Fields:
- Handle: The unique identifier for the product.
- Title: The name of the product.
- Body (HTML): The HTML description of the product.
- Vendor: The name of the product's vendor.
- Product Type: The category or type of the product.
- Tags: Keywords associated with the product.
- Published: Indicates whether the product is published or unpublished.

Options:
- Option Name
- Option Value

Variants:
- Variant SKU: The stock keeping unit for the variant.
- Variant Grams: The weight of the variant in grams.
- Variant Price: The price of the variant.
- Variant Compare At Price: The original price of the variant, used for comparison.
- Variant Inventory Qty: Inventory quantity, where 0 indicates out of stock and 1 indicates in stock.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Variants:
- Variant Barcode: The barcode for the variant.
- Variant Tax Code: The tax code associated with the variant.
- Variant Weight Unit: The unit of weight measurement for the variant.

Images:
- Image Src: The source URL of the image.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Images:
- Image Alt Text: The alternative text for the image.

"Shopify Spy షాపిఫై పవర్డ్ స్టోర్ల నుండి ఉత్పతులను స్క్రేప్ చేసి దాన్ని ఎక్సెల్ డాక్యుమెంట్ లేదా CSV ఫైల్గా సేవ్ చేస్తుంది.

2023 Q3 మార్పులు:
- అండాక్ పాపప్: స్క్రేపింగ్ ప్రోగ్రెస్లో ఉన్నప్పుడు మీరు బ్రౌజర్ను ఉపయోగించవచ్చు మరియు ఒకేసారిగా అనేక స్టోర్లను స్క్రేప్ చేయవచ్చు
- తాజాగా తయారుచేసిన లాగిన్ ప్రవాహం

Shopify Spy లక్షణాలు:
✓ నిమిషాల్లోనే వేలాది ఉత్పతులను ఎక్స్ట్రాక్ట్ చేయగలడు
✓ ప్రత్యేక సేకరణం ద్వారా ఫిల్టర్ చేయగలడు
✓ Shopify ఉత్పతుల జాబితా నుండి అన్ని ఫీల్డ్లు జోడించబడ్డాయి (కింద చూడండి)
✓ అన్ని ఉత్పతి చిత్రాలు CSV కు జోడించబడ్డాయి
✓ Shopify దిగుమతి ఫార్మాట్తో అనుకూలమైన CSV ఫార్మాట్లో ఎగుమతి చేయగలడు (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ సరైన డేటా రకాలు - తేదీలు, ధరలు తో XLSX (ఎక్సెల్ డాక్యుమెంట్) గా సేవ్ చేయగలడు
✓ అతిగా అనుమతులను అవసరం కాదు

Shopify Spy ఎందుకు:

ఈ-కామర్స్ స్టోర్ యొక్క యజమానులు, Shopify Spy మీ పోటీపరుల ఉత్పతుల, ధరల, ప్రమోషన్లను ట్రాక్ చేసేందుకు అనుమతిస్తుంది. ఈ టూల్తో, మీరు త్వరగా మరియు సులభంగా Shopify పవర్డ్ స్టోర్ల నుండి వేలాది ఉత్పతులను ఎక్స్ట్రాక్ట్ చేసి, వాటిని ప్రత్యేక సేకరణల ద్వారా ఫిల్టర్ చేయవచ్చు.

డిజిటల్ మార్కెటర్లకు, Shopify Spy మీ క్లయింట్ల కోసం సంభావ్య అవకాశాలను గుర్తించడానికి మీకు సహాయపడే ఖచ్చితమైన మరియు విశ్వసనీయ ఉత్పతి డేటాను అందిస్తుంది.

ఉత్పతి పరిశోధకులకు, Shopify Spy త్వరగా మరియు ప్రభావవంతంగా పెద్ద సంఖ్యలో ఉత్పతుల మీద డేటాను సేకరించడానికి సులభం చేస్తుంది. ఇది అంటే, మీ పరిశోధన రంగంలో మీరు త్వరగా మరియు సులభంగా చరిత్రలు మరియు అంతర్దృష్టిని గుర్తించవచ్చు.

డ్రాప్షిపర్లకు, Shopify Spy మీ స్టోర్కు కొత్త ఉత్పతులను జోడించడానికి మరియు మీ ప్రస్తుత ఉత్పతుల ధరలను మరియు ఉత్పతి అందుబాటులో ఉన్నదా లేదా కాదా మనిటర్ చేయడానికి అత్యవసర సాధనం.

డేటా విశ్లేషకులకు, Shopify Spy యొక్క Shopify స్టోర్ల నుండి ఉత్పతి డేటాను ఎక్స్ట్రాక్ట్ చేయడానికి మరియు దాన్ని CSV లేదా ఎక్సెల్ ఫార్మాట్లో సేవ్ చేయడానికి సాధ్యత ఇవ్వడం వల్ల అది పెద్ద మొత్తాలు డేటాను త్వరగా మరియు ప్రభావవంతంగా ప్రాసెస్ చేయడానికి ఆకర్షణీయ సాధనం.

అందువలన, మీరు ఈ-కామర్స్ స్టోర్ యొక్క యజమాని, డిజిటల్ మార్

Introducing "Dropshipping Detective", the ultimate chrome extension for all your dropshipping needs. This powerful tool scrapes products from Shopify powered stores, saving them as an Excel document or CSV file, providing you with a wealth of information at your fingertips. 

The Q3 2023 updates have revolutionized the way you can use the Dropshipping Detective. With the undock popup feature, you can now multitask effortlessly. Browse the internet while the scraping is in progress or even scrape several stores simultaneously. The renewed login flow has been designed to make your user experience seamless and efficient. 

Dropshipping Detective features:
✓ Extract thousands of products within minutes, catering to your dropshipping needs
✓ Filter by a specific collection, perfect for targeted dropshipping research
✓ Comprehensive data extraction from Shopify product listing, providing you with all the information you need for successful dropshipping
✓ All product images are added to the CSV, helping you visualize your dropshipping inventory
✓ Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format, making the transition to your own dropshipping store a breeze
✓ Save as XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices
✓ Does not require excessive permissions, ensuring your dropshipping business's safety and security

Why Dropshipping Detective?

For e-commerce store owners, Dropshipping Detective is your secret weapon, keeping you abreast of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. This tool helps you stay ahead in the game by providing insights into thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores, filtered by specific collections. 

For digital marketers, Dropshipping Detective offers reliable product data for effective market trend analysis. It identifies potential dropshipping opportunities for your clients, helping you deliver exceptional results.

For product researchers, Dropshipping Detective simplifies data collection on a large scale. It supports your dropshipping research by identifying trends and insights quickly and efficiently.

For dropshippers, Dropshipping Detective is an indispensable tool. It aids in discovering new products for your store and monitoring pricing and product availability for your existing inventory.

For data analysts, Dropshipping Detective's ability to extract and save product data from Shopify stores in CSV or Excel format makes it an invaluable tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

So, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, a digital marketer, a product researcher, a dropshipper, or a data analyst, Dropshipping Detective is your one-stop solution for all your dropshipping needs. Elevate your business to new heights with this powerful tool today!

Supported fields:
- Title
- Handle
- Description (in plain text)
- Creation and Updated dates and times
- Vendor, Product Type, Tags
- Max and Min prices
- 5 product variants including title, price, discount price, and image URL
- 10 images
- All options.

Shopify Spy ทำการดึงข้อมูลสินค้าจากร้านค้าที่ใช้ Shopify แล้วบันทึกเป็นเอกสาร Excel หรือไฟล์ CSV

การเปลี่ยนแปลงใน Q3 2023:
- ปรับปรุงหน้าต่างป็อปอัป: คุณสามารถใช้เบราว์เซอร์ขณะที่การดึงข้อมูลกำลังดำเนินการและแม้กระทั่งดึงข้อมูลจากร้านค้าหลายร้านพร้อมกันได้
- ปรับปรุงกระบวนการเข้าสู่ระบบ

คุณสมบัติของ Shopify Spy:
✓ สามารถดึงข้อมูลสินค้าจำนวนมากภายในนาที
✓ กรองตามคอลเล็กชั่นเฉพาะ
✓ รวมทุกฟิลด์จากการแสดงรายการสินค้าใน Shopify (ดูรายละเอียดด้านล่าง)
✓ เพิ่มภาพสินค้าทั้งหมดเข้าไปในไฟล์ CSV
✓ ส่งออกเป็นรูปแบบ CSV ที่สามารถใช้กับรูปแบบการนำเข้า Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ บันทึกเป็น XLSX (เอกสาร Excel) พร้อมประเภทข้อมูลที่เหมาะสม - วันที่, ราคา
✓ ไม่ต้องการสิทธิ์การเข้าถึงที่มากเกินไป

ทำไมต้อง Shopify Spy:

สำหรับเจ้าของร้านค้าอีคอมเมิร์ซ, Shopify Spy ช่วยให้คุณสามารถติดตามสินค้า, ราคา, และโปรโมชั่นของคู่แข่งของคุณได้ ด้วยเครื่องมือนี้, คุณสามารถดึงข้อมูลสินค้าจากร้านค้าที่ใช้ Shopify ได้เร็วและง่ายๆ และกรองตามคอลเล็กชั่นเฉพาะ

สำหรับนักการตลาดดิจิตอล, Shopify Spy ให้ข้อมูลสินค้าที่ถูกต้องและเชื่อถือได้เพื่อช่วยคุณวิเคราะห์แนวโน้มของตลาดและระบุโอกาสที่เป็นไปได้สำหรับลูกค้าของคุณ

สำหรับนักวิจัยผลิตภัณฑ์, Shopify Spy ทำให้การรวบรวมข้อมูลเกี่ยวกับจำนวนสินค้าที่มากขึ้นเป็นเรื่องง่าย สิ่งนี้หมายความว่าคุณสามารถระบุแนวโน้มและข้อมูลสำคัญในสาขาวิชาการวิจัยของคุณได้ง่ายๆ

สำหรับผู้ประกอบการดรอปชิป, Shopify Spy เป็นเครื่องมือที่จำเป็นสำหรับการค้นหาสินค้าใหม่เพื่อเพิ่มเข้าไปในร้านค้าของคุณ และตรวจสอบราคาและสินค้าที่มีอยู่สำหรับสินค้าที่มีอยู่ของคุณ

สำหรับนักวิเคราะห์ข้อมูล, ความสามารถของ Shopify Spy ในการดึงข้อมูลสินค้าจากร้านค้า Shopify และบันทึกเป็นรูปแบบ CSV หรือ Excel ทำให้เป็นเครื่องมือที่น่าสนใจสำหรับการประมวลผลข้อมูลจำนวนมากอย่างรวดเร็วและมีประสิทธิภาพ

ดังนั้น, ไม่ว่าคุณจะเป็นเจ้าของร้านค้าอีคอมเมิร์ซ, นักการตลาดดิจิตอล, นักวิจัยผลิตภัณฑ์, ผู้ประกอบการดรอปชิป, หรือนักวิเคราะห์ข้อมูล, Shopify Spy มีทุกอย่างที่คุณต้องการเพื่อติดตามแนวโน้มและข้อมูลสินค้าล่าสุด ลองใช้วันนี้และพัฒนาธุรกิจของคุณไปยังระดับถัดไป!

ฟิลด์ที่รองรับ:
- ชื่อ
- ด้าน
- รายละเอียด (ในรูปแบบข้อความธรรมดา)
- วันที่และเวลาที่สร้าง
- วันที่และเวลาที่อัปเดต
- ผู้ขาย
- ประเภทสินค้า
- แท็ก
- ราคาสูงสุด
- ราคาต่ำสุด
- 5 รูปแบบสินค้า รวมถึงชื่อ, ราคา, ราคาส่วนลด, และ URL ของภาพ
- 10 รูปภาพ
- ทุกตัวเลือก
long.tr:
Shopify Spy scrapes products from Shopify powered stores and saves as an Excel document or CSV file.

2024 Q3 changes:
- Download a single product
- Display some store metadata
- Better handling if errors

2024 Q2 changes:
- Highly requested feature: Downloading images.
- Slow mode: Extract more fields but slower: Variant Barcode, Image Alt Text, Variant Tax Code, Variant Weight Unit
- Old "Excel" format has been renamed to "Excel (Legacy)" and will be removed in further releases
- Option to manually specify a collection handle if the list of collections is too large.
- Enhanced error handling with clearer explanations

2024 Q1 changes:
- Resolved "Out of memory" error for large stores; now, CSV/Excel files are automatically split for efficient data handling.
- Improved status messages for enhanced clarity and precision.

2023 Q3-Q4 changes:
- Undock popup: you can use browser while the scraping is in progress and even scrape several store simultaneously
- Renewed login flow

Shopify Spy features:
✓ Can extract thousands of products within minutes
✓ Filter by a specific collection
✓ All fields from Shopify product listing are included (see below)
✓ All product images are added to the CSV
✓ Download images along with CSV
✓ Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Save as XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices
✓ Does not require excessive permissions

Why Shopify Spy:

For e-commerce store owners, Shopify Spy allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. With this tool, you can quickly and easily extract thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores and filter them by specific collections.

For digital marketers, Shopify Spy provides accurate and reliable product data to help you analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients.

For product researchers, Shopify Spy makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. This means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

For dropshippers, Shopify Spy is an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store, and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products.

For data analysts, Shopify Spy's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

So, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, Shopify Spy has everything you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try it out today and take your business to the next level!

Supported Fields:
- Handle: The unique identifier for the product.
- Title: The name of the product.
- Body (HTML): The HTML description of the product.
- Vendor: The name of the product's vendor.
- Product Type: The category or type of the product.
- Tags: Keywords associated with the product.
- Published: Indicates whether the product is published or unpublished.

Options:
- Option Name
- Option Value

Variants:
- Variant SKU: The stock keeping unit for the variant.
- Variant Grams: The weight of the variant in grams.
- Variant Price: The price of the variant.
- Variant Compare At Price: The original price of the variant, used for comparison.
- Variant Inventory Qty: Inventory quantity, where 0 indicates out of stock and 1 indicates in stock.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Variants:
- Variant Barcode: The barcode for the variant.
- Variant Tax Code: The tax code associated with the variant.
- Variant Weight Unit: The unit of weight measurement for the variant.

Images:
- Image Src: The source URL of the image.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Images:
- Image Alt Text: The alternative text for the image.

Shopify Spy, Shopify destekli mağazalardan ürünleri kazıyarak bunları bir Excel belgesi veya CSV dosyası olarak kaydeder.

2023 3. çeyrek değişiklikler:
- Popup'ı ayırın: kazıma işlemi devam ederken tarayıcıyı kullanabilir ve hatta birkaç mağazayı aynı anda kazıyabilirsiniz
- Yenilenmiş giriş akışı

Shopify Spy özellikleri:
✓ Dakikalar içinde binlerce ürünü çıkarabilir
✓ Belirli bir koleksiyona göre filtreleme
✓ Shopify ürün listesinden tüm alanlar dahil edilmiştir (aşağıya bakınız)
✓ Tüm ürün resimleri CSV'ye eklenir
✓ Shopify içe aktarma formatıyla uyumlu CSV formatına aktarım (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ XLSX (Excel belgesi) olarak uygun veri türleriyle kaydetme - tarihler, fiyatlar
✓ Aşırı izinler gerektirmez

Neden Shopify Spy:

E-ticaret mağaza sahipleri için, Shopify Spy, rakiplerinizin ürünlerini, fiyatlarını ve promosyonlarını takip etmenizi sağlar. Bu araçla, Shopify destekli mağazalardan binlerce ürünü hızlı ve kolay bir şekilde çıkarabilir ve bunları belirli koleksiyonlara göre filtreleyebilirsiniz.

Dijital pazarlamacılar için, Shopify Spy size pazar eğilimlerini analiz etmenize ve müşterileriniz için potansiyel fırsatları belirlemenize yardımcı olacak doğru ve güvenilir ürün verileri sağlar.

Ürün araştırmacıları için, Shopify Spy, büyük miktarda ürün verisini hızlı ve verimli bir şekilde toplamanızı kolaylaştırır. Bu, araştırma alanınızdaki eğilimleri ve içgörüleri rahatça belirlemenizi sağlar.

Dropshipping yapanlar için, Shopify Spy, mağazanıza eklemek için yeni ürünler bulmanın ve mevcut ürünlerinizin fiyatlarını ve ürün mevcudiyetini izlemenin önemli bir aracıdır.

Veri analistleri için, Shopify Spy'ın Shopify mağazalarından ürün verilerini çıkarabilme ve bunları CSV veya Excel formatında kaydedebilme yeteneği, büyük miktarda veriyi hızlı ve verimli bir şekilde işlemek için çekici bir araçtır.

Yani, bir e-ticaret mağaza sahibi, dijital pazarlamacı, ürün araştırmacısı, dropshipper veya veri analisti olun, Shopify Spy, en son ürün trendlerini ve içgörüleri takip etmek için ihtiyacınız olan her şeye sahiptir. Bugün deneyin ve işinizi bir sonraki seviyeye taşıyın!

Desteklenen alanlar:
- Başlık
- Sap
- Açıklama (düz metin olarak)
- Oluşturulma tarihi ve saati
- Güncellenme tarihi ve saati
- Satıcı
- Ürün Türü
- Etiketler
- Maksimum fiyat
- Minimum fiyat
- Başlık, fiyat, indirimli fiyat ve resim URL'si dahil olmak üzere 5 ürün varyantı
- 10 resim
- tüm seçenekler

Розширення з брендом: `Shopify spy scraper & parser` та заголовком `Витягніть список продуктів з магазинів Shopify в Excel/CSV` перекладається так:

Shopify Spy збирає продукти з магазинів на базі Shopify та зберігає їх у вигляді документа Excel або файлу CSV.

Зміни 2023 Q3:
- Вікно, що відкріплюється: ви можете користуватися браузером під час витягування даних та навіть збирати дані з кількох магазинів одночасно
- Оновлений процес входу

Функції Shopify Spy:
✓ Може витягнути тисячі продуктів за кілька хвилин
✓ Фільтр за конкретною колекцією
✓ Усі поля зі списку продуктів Shopify включено (див. нижче)
✓ Усі зображення продуктів додаються до CSV
✓ Експорт у форматі CSV, сумісному з форматом імпорту Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Збереження як XLSX (документ Excel) з відповідними типами даних - дати, ціни
✓ Не вимагає надмірних дозволів

Чому Shopify Spy:

Для власників інтернет-магазинів, Shopify Spy дозволяє відстежувати продукти, ціни та акції ваших конкурентів. За допомогою цього інструменту ви можете швидко та легко витягнути тисячі продуктів з магазинів на базі Shopify та відфільтрувати їх за конкретними колекціями.

Для цифрових маркетологів, Shopify Spy надає точні та надійні дані про продукти, що допомагають аналізувати тенденції ринку та виявляти потенційні можливості для ваших клієнтів.

Для дослідників продуктів, Shopify Spy спрощує збір даних про велику кількість продуктів швидко та ефективно. Це означає, що ви можете легко виявляти тенденції та перспективи у своїй галузі дослідження.

Для дропшиперів, Shopify Spy є незамінним інструментом для пошуку нових продуктів для додавання до вашого магазину, а також для моніторингу цін та наявності продуктів.

Для аналітиків даних, можливість Shopify Spy витягувати дані про продукти з магазинів Shopify та зберігати їх у форматі CSV або Excel робить його привабливим інструментом для обробки великої кількості даних швидко та ефективно.

Тому, незалежно від того, власником якого ви є інтернет-магазину, цифровим маркетологом, дослідником продуктів, дропшипером чи аналітиком даних, Shopify Spy має все, що вам потрібно, щоб бути в курсі останніх тенденцій та перспектив продуктів. Спробуйте його сьогодні та підніміть свій бізнес на новий рівень!

- Тип продукту
- Теги
- Максимальна ціна
- Мінімальна ціна
- 5 варіантів продукту, включаючи назву, ціну, знижкову ціну та URL зображення
- 10 зображень
- всі опції

Why Shopify Spy:

For digital marketers, Shopify Spy provides accurate and reliable product data to help you analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients.

Shopify Spy rút trích sản phẩm từ các cửa hàng được cung cấp bởi Shopify và lưu dưới dạng tài liệu Excel hoặc tệp CSV.

Thay đổi Q3 2023:
- Cửa sổ popup không cố định: bạn có thể sử dụng trình duyệt trong khi quá trình rút trích đang diễn ra và thậm chí rút trích từ nhiều cửa hàng cùng một lúc
- Luồng đăng nhập mới

Tính năng của Shopify Spy:
✓ Có thể rút trích hàng nghìn sản phẩm trong vòng vài phút
✓ Lọc theo một bộ sưu tập cụ thể
✓ Tất cả các trường từ danh sách sản phẩm Shopify đều được bao gồm (xem bên dưới)
✓ Tất cả hình ảnh sản phẩm đều được thêm vào tệp CSV
✓ Xuất ra định dạng CSV tương thích với định dạng nhập của Shopify (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Lưu dưới dạng XLSX (tài liệu Excel) với các loại dữ liệu phù hợp - ngày, giá
✓ Không yêu cầu quyền truy cập quá mức

Tại sao chọn Shopify Spy:

Đối với chủ cửa hàng thương mại điện tử, Shopify Spy cho phép bạn theo dõi sản phẩm, giá cả và khuyến mãi của đối thủ cạnh tranh. Với công cụ này, bạn có thể nhanh chóng và dễ dàng rút trích hàng nghìn sản phẩm từ các cửa hàng được cung cấp bởi Shopify và lọc chúng theo bộ sưu tập cụ thể.

Đối với người tiếp thị số, Shopify Spy cung cấp dữ liệu sản phẩm chính xác và đáng tin cậy để giúp bạn phân tích xu hướng thị trường và xác định cơ hội tiềm năng cho khách hàng của bạn.

Đối với nhà nghiên cứu sản phẩm, Shopify Spy giúp bạn thu thập dữ liệu về một số lượng lớn sản phẩm nhanh chóng và hiệu quả. Điều này có nghĩa là bạn có thể xác định xu hướng và thông tin chi tiết trong lĩnh vực nghiên cứu của mình một cách dễ dàng.

Đối với nhà bán hàng theo mô hình dropshipping, Shopify Spy là công cụ thiết yếu để tìm kiếm sản phẩm mới để thêm vào cửa hàng của bạn và theo dõi giá cả và tình hình sản phẩm hiện có.

Đối với nhà phân tích dữ liệu, khả năng rút trích dữ liệu sản phẩm từ các cửa hàng Shopify và lưu nó dưới dạng tệp CSV hoặc Excel của Shopify Spy làm cho nó trở thành công cụ hấp dẫn để xử lý lượng lớn dữ liệu nhanh chóng và hiệu quả.

Vì vậy, dù bạn là chủ cửa hàng thương mại điện tử, người tiếp thị số, nhà nghiên cứu sản phẩm, nhà bán hàng theo mô hình dropshipping, hay nhà phân tích dữ liệu, Shopify Spy đều có đầy đủ những gì bạn cần để cập nhật xu hướng sản phẩm và thông tin chi tiết mới nhất. Hãy thử nó ngay hôm nay và đưa doanh nghiệp của bạn lên một tầm cao mới!

Các trường được hỗ trợ:
- Tiêu đề
- Handle
- Mô tả (dưới dạng văn bản thuần túy)
- Ngày và thời gian tạo
- Ngày và thời gian cập nhật
- Nhà cung cấp
- Loại sản phẩm
- Thẻ
- Giá cao nhất
- Giá thấp nhất
- 5 biến thể sản phẩm bao gồm tiêu đề, giá, giá giảm, và URL hình ảnh
- 10 hình ảnh
- tất cả các lựa chọn
long.zh_CN:
Shopify Spy scrapes products from Shopify powered stores and saves as an Excel document or CSV file.

2024 Q3 changes:
- Download a single product
- Display some store metadata
- Better handling if errors

2024 Q2 changes:
- Highly requested feature: Downloading images.
- Slow mode: Extract more fields but slower: Variant Barcode, Image Alt Text, Variant Tax Code, Variant Weight Unit
- Old "Excel" format has been renamed to "Excel (Legacy)" and will be removed in further releases
- Option to manually specify a collection handle if the list of collections is too large.
- Enhanced error handling with clearer explanations

2024 Q1 changes:
- Resolved "Out of memory" error for large stores; now, CSV/Excel files are automatically split for efficient data handling.
- Improved status messages for enhanced clarity and precision.

2023 Q3-Q4 changes:
- Undock popup: you can use browser while the scraping is in progress and even scrape several store simultaneously
- Renewed login flow

Shopify Spy features:
✓ Can extract thousands of products within minutes
✓ Filter by a specific collection
✓ All fields from Shopify product listing are included (see below)
✓ All product images are added to the CSV
✓ Download images along with CSV
✓ Export to CSV format compatible with Shopify import format (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ Save as XLSX (Excel document) with proper data types - dates, prices
✓ Does not require excessive permissions

Why Shopify Spy:

For e-commerce store owners, Shopify Spy allows you to keep track of your competitors' products, pricing, and promotions. With this tool, you can quickly and easily extract thousands of products from Shopify-powered stores and filter them by specific collections.

For digital marketers, Shopify Spy provides accurate and reliable product data to help you analyze market trends and identify potential opportunities for your clients.

For product researchers, Shopify Spy makes it easy to gather data on a large number of products quickly and efficiently. This means you can identify trends and insights in your field of research with ease.

For dropshippers, Shopify Spy is an essential tool for finding new products to add to your store, and monitor pricing and product availability for your existing products.

For data analysts, Shopify Spy's ability to extract product data from Shopify stores and save it in a CSV or Excel format makes it an attractive tool for processing large amounts of data quickly and efficiently.

So, whether you're an e-commerce store owner, digital marketer, product researcher, dropshipper, or data analyst, Shopify Spy has everything you need to stay on top of the latest product trends and insights. Try it out today and take your business to the next level!

Supported Fields:
- Handle: The unique identifier for the product.
- Title: The name of the product.
- Body (HTML): The HTML description of the product.
- Vendor: The name of the product's vendor.
- Product Type: The category or type of the product.
- Tags: Keywords associated with the product.
- Published: Indicates whether the product is published or unpublished.

Options:
- Option Name
- Option Value

Variants:
- Variant SKU: The stock keeping unit for the variant.
- Variant Grams: The weight of the variant in grams.
- Variant Price: The price of the variant.
- Variant Compare At Price: The original price of the variant, used for comparison.
- Variant Inventory Qty: Inventory quantity, where 0 indicates out of stock and 1 indicates in stock.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Variants:
- Variant Barcode: The barcode for the variant.
- Variant Tax Code: The tax code associated with the variant.
- Variant Weight Unit: The unit of weight measurement for the variant.

Images:
- Image Src: The source URL of the image.

Slow Mode Additional Fields for Images:
- Image Alt Text: The alternative text for the image.

Shopify Spy 从由Shopify驱动的商店中抓取产品，并将其保存为Excel文档或CSV文件。

2023年第三季度的变化：
- 可拖动弹出窗口：在抓取进行时，您可以使用浏览器，甚至可以同时抓取多个商店
- 更新了登录流程

Shopify Spy的功能：
✓ 可在几分钟内提取数千个产品
✓ 可按特定集合进行筛选
✓ 包含来自Shopify产品列表的所有字段（如下所示）
✓ 所有产品图片都被添加到CSV中
✓ 导出到与Shopify导入格式兼容的CSV格式 (https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products)
✓ 以XLSX格式（Excel文档）保存，具有适当的数据类型 - 日期，价格
✓ 不需要过多的权限

为什么选择Shopify Spy：

对于电商店主，Shopify Spy使您能够跟踪竞争对手的产品，价格和促销活动。有了这个工具，您可以快速轻松地从Shopify驱动的商店中提取数千个产品，并按特定集合进行筛选。

对于数字营销人员，Shopify Spy提供准确可靠的产品数据，帮助您分析市场趋势，为您的客户寻找潜在机会。

对于产品研究员，Shopify Spy使得快速高效地收集大量产品数据变得容易。这意味着您可以轻松地发现您研究领域的趋势和洞察。

对于跨境电商，Shopify Spy是寻找新产品以添加到您的商店，并监控现有产品的定价和产品可用性的必备工具。

对于数据分析师，Shopify Spy能够从Shopify商店中提取产品数据并将其保存为CSV或Excel格式，使其成为快速高效处理大量数据的有吸引力的工具。

因此，无论您是电商店主，数字营销人员，产品研究员，跨境电商，还是数据分析师，Shopify Spy都拥有您需要的一切，以跟上最新的产品趋势和洞察。今天就试试吧，让您的业务更上一层楼！

支持的字段：
- 标题
- 句柄
- 描述（纯文本）
- 创建日期和时间
- 更新日期和时间
- 卖家
- 产品类型
- 标签
- 最高价格
- 最低价格
- 包括标题，价格，折扣价格和图片URL的5个产品变体
- 10张图片
- 所有选项

Shopify Spy 從 Shopify 驅動的商店擷取產品並儲存為 Excel 文件或 CSV 檔案。

2023 年第三季度變更：
- 可移動彈出窗口：在抓取進行時，您可以使用瀏覽器，甚至可以同時抓取多家商店
- 重新設計的登入流程

Shopify Spy 功能：
✓ 可在幾分鐘內提取數千種產品
✓ 可按特定收藏過濾
✓ 包含 Shopify 產品列表的所有欄位（見下文）
✓ 所有產品圖像都加入到 CSV 中
✓ 匯出到與 Shopify 匯入格式相容的 CSV 格式（https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/import-export/import-products）
✓ 以適當的資料類型儲存為 XLSX（Excel 文件） - 日期、價格
✓ 不需要過多權限

為什麼選擇 Shopify Spy：

對於電子商務店鋪擁有者，Shopify Spy 讓您能夠追蹤競爭對手的產品、定價和促銷活動。有了這個工具，您可以快速輕鬆地從 Shopify 驅動的商店中提取數千種產品，並按特定收藏進行過濾。

對於數位行銷人員，Shopify Spy 提供準確且可靠的產品數據，以幫助您分析市場趨勢並為您的客戶找到潛在機會。

對於產品研究員，Shopify Spy 讓您可以輕鬆地快速有效地收集大量產品的數據。這意味著您可以輕鬆地識別出您研究領域的趨勢和見解。

對於代理商，Shopify Spy 是找到新產品以添加到您的商店，並監控您現有產品的定價和產品供應的必要工具。

對於數據分析師，Shopify Spy 能夠從 Shopify 商店中提取產品數據並將其儲存為 CSV 或 Excel 格式，使其成為快速有效地處理大量數據的吸引人的工具。

所以，無論您是電子商務店鋪擁有者、數位行銷人員、產品研究員、代理商還是數據分析師，Shopify Spy 都能提供您所需的一切，讓您掌握最新的產品趨勢和見解。今天就試用它，將您的業務提升到新的高度！

支持的欄位：
- 標題
- 處理
- 描述 (純文本)
- 創建日期和時間
- 更新日期和時間
- 供應商
- 產品類型
- 標籤
- 最高價格
- 最低價格
- 包括標題、價格、折扣價格和圖片網址的 5 種產品變體
- 10 張圖片
- 所有選項
